19001122.en: <voice 00003_19001122><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ho ho ho! It's good to finally see you all here!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001122.ja:
<voice 00003_19001122><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ホッホッホッ……
　みな　よく来たの。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001122.ko:
<voice 00003_19001122><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 홋홋홋……
　모두 잘 왔네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001122.zh-Hans:
<voice 00003_19001122><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
各位来得好。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001122.zh-Hant:
<voice 00003_19001122><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
各位來得好。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10495.en: <voice 00280_00010495><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That is the stronghold of Nergel... Hades' Heart.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10495.ja:
<voice 00280_00010495><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「あれが　ネルゲルの居城……
　冥王の心臓じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10495.ko:
<voice 00280_00010495><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 저것이 네르겔의 성……
　명왕의 심장일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10495.zh-Hans:
<voice 00280_00010495><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那就是内尔格尔的城堡……
冥王心脏。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10495.zh-Hant:
<voice 00280_00010495><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那就是內爾格爾的城堡……
冥王心臟。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10496.en:
<voice 00400_00010496><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Inside lies Nergel himself, who not only destroyed
Ethene but sealed the entirety of Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10496.ja:
<voice 00400_00010496><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「あの中に　おぬしら　エテーネの民を滅ぼし
　レンダーシアを封印した　悪の権化
　にっくき　ネルゲルがおる。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10496.ko:
<voice 00400_00010496><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 저 안에 자네들 에테네 주민을 멸망시키고
　렌더시아를 봉인한 악의 화신,
　그 증오스러운 네르겔이 있네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10496.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00010496><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>毁灭了你们伊甸之民，
并且封印了冷达西亚的邪恶化身——
可憎的内尔格尔就隐藏在里面。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10496.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00010496><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>毀滅了你們伊甸子民，
並且封印了冷達西亞的邪惡化身──
可憎的內爾格爾就隱藏在裡面。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10497.en:
<voice 00470_00010497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Time fer me ta summon a Bridge of Light so ya can
infiltrate Hades' Heart. Cross it and end his reign
of terror...!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10497.ja:
<voice 00470_00010497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「今から　わしが　冥王の心臓に行けるよう
　光の橋を　かけてやろう。
　それを渡り　ネルゲルを倒してくるのじゃ……！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10497.ko:
<voice 00470_00010497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 지금부터 내가 명왕의 심장에 갈 수 있게
　빛의 다리를 만들어 주겠네.
　그걸 건너 네르겔을 쓰러뜨리고 오게나……!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10497.zh-Hans:
<voice 00470_00010497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我会架起
通向冥王心脏的光之桥。
渡过光之桥，去打倒内尔格尔吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10497.zh-Hant:
<voice 00470_00010497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我會架起通往冥王心臟的光之橋。
渡過光之橋，
去打倒內爾格爾吧……！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10498.en: <voice 00660_00010498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now then, let's go.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10498.ja: <voice 00660_00010498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「では　ゆくぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10498.ko: <voice 00660_00010498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 시작하겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10498.zh-Hans: <voice 00660_00010498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那我开始了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10498.zh-Hant: <voice 00660_00010498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那就開始了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10499.ja: <voice 01180_00010499><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かああああぁぁぁぁぁぁ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10499.zh-Hant: <voice 01180_00010499><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>喝啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10500.en: <voice 01800_00010500><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Aye, such evil power...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10500.ja: <voice 01800_00010500><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「なんという　邪悪なチカラじゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10500.ko: <voice 01800_00010500><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 어찌 이런 사악한 힘이…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10500.zh-Hans: <voice 01800_00010500><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好可怕的邪气……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10500.zh-Hant: <voice 01800_00010500><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好驚人的邪惡力量……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001123.en:
<voice 01880_19001123><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Even if I could muster up'a bridge, it'd likely
swallow ye up.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001123.ja:
<voice 01880_19001123><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「たとえ　橋が　かかったとしても
　あれでは　おぬしらが呑み込まれてしまうな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001123.ko:
<voice 01880_19001123><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 설령 다리가 놓였다 해도
　저 상태로는 자네들이 빨려 들어갈 뻔했군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001123.zh-Hans:
<voice 01880_19001123><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>就算桥能架好，
你们也会被那邪气吞没的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001123.zh-Hant:
<voice 01880_19001123><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>就算橋能架好，
你們也會被那邪氣吞沒的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10502.en: <voice 01955_00010502><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Aye, what te' do now...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10502.ja: <voice 01955_00010502><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「さて　どうしたものか……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10502.ko: <voice 01955_00010502><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이제 어쩐다…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10502.zh-Hans: <voice 01955_00010502><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>唉，怎么办呢……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10502.zh-Hant: <voice 01955_00010502><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>接下來，該怎麼辦呢……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10503.en:
<voice 01985_00010503><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...Come ta think of it, my wife told me somethin'
that bothered 'em before...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10503.ja:
<voice 01985_00010503><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……そう言えば　わしの連れ合いが
　昔　気になることを　言っておったな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10503.ko:
<voice 01985_00010503><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……그러고 보니 예전에 내 아내가
　의미심장한 말을 남겼었지…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10503.zh-Hans:
<voice 01985_00010503><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……对了，我老伴曾经
说过一件令我在意的事……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10503.zh-Hant:
<voice 01985_00010503><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……對了，我老伴曾經
說過一件令我在意的事……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10504.en:
<voice 02065_00010504><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>She had a gift o' foresight. Could guess everythin'
bang on. One day she said out of the blue...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10504.ja:
<voice 02065_00010504><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「わしの連れ合いは　予知のチカラを持つ女でな。
　なんでも　ピシャリと言い当てた。
　やつが　ある日　突然言ったんじゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10504.ko:
<voice 02065_00010504><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 내 아내는 예지력을 지닌 여인이었는데
　무엇이든 정확히 맞혔다네.
　그런데 어느 날, 아내가 그러더군…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10504.zh-Hans:
<voice 02065_00010504><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我老伴拥有预知未来的能力，
什么都能被她说中。
有一天她说了这么一番话……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10504.zh-Hant:
<voice 02065_00010504><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我老伴擅長預知未來，
什麼都能被她說中。
有一天她說了這麼一番話……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10505.en:
<voice 02120_00010505><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That a shining Sacred Ship will cross time and ferry
the savior through the Great Darkness...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10505.ja:
<voice 02120_00010505><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「輝ける破邪舟は　時の海を渡り
　救世主　大いなる闇を　越える……
　とな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10505.ko:
<voice 02120_00010505><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 빛나는 파사주가 시간의 바다를 건너면
　구세주는 거대한 어둠을 넘는다……
　라고 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10505.zh-Hans:
<voice 02120_00010505><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>耀眼的破邪舟渡过时光之海，
救世主跨越巨大的黑暗……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10505.zh-Hant:
<voice 02120_00010505><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>耀眼的破邪舟渡過時光之海，
救世主跨越巨大的黑暗……
這樣。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10506.en:
<voice 02175_00010506><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>The Sacred Ship, as the name implies, is a rumored
magical ship that drives away evil and soars through
the skies...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10506.ja:
<voice 02175_00010506><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「破邪舟とは　その名の通り　邪悪をしりぞけ
　天空を駆ける　魔法の舟だという話じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10506.ko:
<voice 02175_00010506><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 파사주란 그 이름대로 사악한 악을 물리치고
　하늘을 가르는 마법의 배라고 하더군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10506.zh-Hans:
<voice 02175_00010506><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>所谓破邪舟，顾名思义，
就是击退邪恶，驰骋于天际的魔法之舟。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10506.zh-Hant:
<voice 02175_00010506><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>所謂破邪舟，顧名思義，
就是擊退邪惡，馳騁於天際的魔法之舟。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10507.en:
<voice 02225_00010507><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>My wife told me that a descendant of the mage able ta
conjure the Sacred Ship appears ta live in Glen
Castletown.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10507.ja:
<voice 02225_00010507><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「連れ合いが言うには　その破邪舟を
　創りだすことができる　魔法使いの末裔が
　グレン城に　身を寄せているらしい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10507.ko:
<voice 02225_00010507><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 내 아내가 말하길 그 파사주를
　만들 수 있는 마법사의 후손이
　그렌성에 살고 있다고 하네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10507.zh-Hans:
<voice 02225_00010507><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我老伴还说，能够创造出
那种破邪舟的魔法师的后裔
就住在古莲城。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10507.zh-Hant:
<voice 02225_00010507><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我老伴還說，能夠創造出
那種破邪舟的魔法師後裔
就住在古蓮城。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10508.en: <voice 02365_00010508><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>With their help, we may be able to reach Hades' Heart...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10508.ja:
<voice 02365_00010508><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「その者の手を借りれば　冥王の心臓まで
　たどりつけるかもしれんな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10508.ko:
<voice 02365_00010508><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그자의 도움을 받으면 명왕의 심장까지
　갈 수 있을지도 모르겠어…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10508.zh-Hans:
<voice 02365_00010508><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>说不定那个人能帮咱们
到达冥王心脏哦……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10508.zh-Hant:
<voice 02365_00010508><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>說不定那個人能協助我們
到達冥王心臟……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10509.en:
<voice 02450_00010509><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>, how about we trust in her
prophecy an' see that we meet this 'Ship Shaper'.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10509.ja:
<voice 02450_00010509><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　ここは　あやつの予言を信じ
　その魔法使いに　会ってみようではないか。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10509.ko:
<voice 02450_00010509><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　지금은 내 아내의 예언을 믿고
　그 마법사를 만나 보는 게 어떻겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10509.zh-Hans:
<voice 02450_00010509><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
看来只能相信我那老伴的预言，
去见见那位魔法师了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10509.zh-Hant:
<voice 02450_00010509><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
看來只能相信我那老伴的預言，
去見見那位魔法師了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10510.en:
<voice 02490_00010510><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I think that I'll be headed fer Glen Castle too.
The Ship Shaper will be there in Castletown fer sure.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10510.ja:
<voice 02490_00010510><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「わしも　グレン城に向かうとしよう。
　破邪舟の魔法使いは　城下町のどこかで
　くらしているはずじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10510.ko:
<voice 02490_00010510><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 나도 그렌성으로 가겠네.
　파사주를 만들 수 있는 마법사는
　그렌 시가지 어딘가에 살고 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10510.zh-Hans:
<voice 02490_00010510><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我也会前往古莲城的。
听说能创造破邪舟的魔法师
就住在古莲的城区里。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10510.zh-Hant:
<voice 02490_00010510><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我也會前往古蓮城的。
破邪舟的魔法師應該就住在
城鎮的某處。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10511.en:
<voice 02540_00010511><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Well then, <pc>. See ya on the
other side!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10511.ja:
<voice 02540_00010511><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>よ。
　また　むこうで落ち合おうぞ！
<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10511.ko:
<voice 02540_00010511><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 <pc>.
　그쪽에서 다시 보세나!
<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10511.zh-Hans:
<voice 02540_00010511><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那么，<pc>，
我们稍后在目的地碰头吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10511.zh-Hant:
<voice 02540_00010511><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>，
我們稍後在目的地碰頭吧！
<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10470.en:
<voice 00220_00010470><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>Whats'a matta wit' you? Ya just barge into people's
house's wit 'out permission? If ya tryin' ta sell
me somethin', get outta here!<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10470.ja:
<voice 00220_00010470><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「な～んだい　アンタ。
　人んちに　勝手に上がり込んできてさ～。
　押し売りなら　帰っとくれよ。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10470.ko:
<voice 00220_00010470><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 당신, 뭐야?
　왜 남의 집에 맘대로 들어오는 거야~
　방문 판매는 사절이니 이만 나가 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10470.zh-Hans:
<voice 00220_00010470><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>你是谁啊？
干嘛随便闯进别人家里啊。
上门推销的话劝你还是快走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10470.zh-Hant:
<voice 00220_00010470><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>你是誰啊？
幹嘛隨便闖進別人家裡～
如果是上門推銷，勸你還是快走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10471.en: <voice 00485_00010471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Sorry to just barge in.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10471.ja: <voice 00485_00010471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「じゃまするぞい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10472.en:
<voice 00725_00010472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Yer Fluka, descendant of the Sacred Sailor aren't ye?
Name's Hollow the Wise and I've come ta ask ye a favor.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10472.ja:
<voice 00725_00010472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「破邪舟使いの末裔　フルッカじゃな？
　わしは　賢者ホーローじゃ。
　そなたに　頼みがあってきた。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10472.ko:
<voice 00725_00010472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 파사주사의 후손 프룻카 맞지?
　난 현자 호로일세.
　자네에게 부탁이 있어서 찾아왔네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10472.zh-Hans:
<voice 00725_00010472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你是破邪舟术师的后裔菲尔迦吧？
我是贤者霍洛。
有件事想请你帮忙。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10472.zh-Hant:
<voice 00725_00010472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>妳是破邪舟術師的後裔菲爾迦吧？
我是賢者霍洛，
有件事想請妳幫忙。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10473.en:
<voice 00765_00010473><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>Eh? Fluka's da' name alright. But a Sacred Sailor
these days...?<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10473.ja:
<voice 00765_00010473><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「え？　フルッカは　あたしだけど。
　今どき　破邪舟使いって……。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10473.ko:
<voice 00765_00010473><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 응? 내가 프룻카긴 한데.
　요즘 세상에 파사주사라니…….<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10473.zh-Hans:
<voice 00765_00010473><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>啊？我的确是菲尔迦，
可这年头谁还记得破邪舟术师……<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10473.zh-Hant:
<voice 00765_00010473><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>咦？我的確是菲爾迦，
可是這年頭哪來的破邪舟術師啊……<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10474.en:
<voice 00845_00010474><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ta be frank, ta get to Hades' Heart, we need yer
power. Can ya use yer Sacred Ship sailin' technique
fer us?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10474.ja:
<voice 00845_00010474><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「単刀直入に言おう。冥王の心臓に行くため
　おぬしのチカラが必要じゃ。
　わしらのために　破邪舟の術を使ってくれんか？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10474.ko:
<voice 00845_00010474><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 단도직입적으로 말하지. 명왕의 심장으로
　가기 위해 자네의 힘이 필요하네.
　우리를 위해 파사주의 술법을 써 주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10474.zh-Hans:
<voice 00845_00010474><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我直说了吧，我们需要
依靠你的力量到冥王心脏去。
你能不能为我们施展破邪舟之术呢？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10474.zh-Hant:
<voice 00845_00010474><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我就直說了，我們需要
借助妳的力量前往冥王心臟。
妳能為我們施展破邪舟之術嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10475.en:
<voice 00890_00010475><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>Wha? Hades' Heart? Whaddya blabblin' about. Besides,
I can't use da Sacred Ship technique.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10475.ja:
<voice 00890_00010475><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「はぁ？　冥王の心臓？　なによそれ。
　それに破邪舟の術なんて　あたしゃ使えないよ。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10475.ko:
<voice 00890_00010475><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 뭐? 명왕의 심장? 그게 뭔데?
　게다가 난 파사주의 술법 같은 건 못 써.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10475.zh-Hans:
<voice 00890_00010475><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>啊？冥王心脏？那是什么呀。
而且我可不会什么破邪舟之术。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10475.zh-Hant:
<voice 00890_00010475><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>啊？冥王心臟？那是什麼？
再說我又不會什麼破邪舟之術。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10476.en:
<voice 00950_00010476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>What? Ya can't use it? Then who can? I heard the
technique of sailin' the Sacred Ship was passed on
from generation ta generation...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10476.ja:
<voice 00950_00010476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「なに？　おぬしは　使えないのか。
　ならば　誰が使える？
　破邪舟の術は　一子相伝の術だと聞いたが……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10476.ko:
<voice 00950_00010476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 뭐라? 자네는 못 쓴단 말인가?
　그렇다면 누가 쓸 수 있지? 파사주의 술법은
　한 명의 자식에게만 전수된다고 들었네만…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10476.zh-Hans:
<voice 00950_00010476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>什么，你不会？
那么谁会用呢？
我听说破邪舟之术都是一脉单传的……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10476.zh-Hant:
<voice 00950_00010476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>什麼？妳不會嗎？
那是誰會用？
我聽說破邪舟之術都是一脈單傳……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10477.en:
<voice 01000_00010477><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>Now, nobody can～. Since I'm an only child, and not
even my dad could.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10477.ja:
<voice 01000_00010477><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「今は　誰も使えないわよ～。
　あたし　ひとりっ子だし
　そもそも　父ちゃんが　使えなかったしね～。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10477.ko:
<voice 01000_00010477><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 이제는 아무도 못 써~
　난 외동이고
　애초에 아버지도 못 썼으니까~<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10477.zh-Hans:
<voice 01000_00010477><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>现在没人会用了。
我是独生女，
而且我也没见我爸爸用过。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10477.zh-Hant:
<voice 01000_00010477><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>現在沒人會用了～
我是獨生女，
再說我爸爸也不會啊～<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10478.en:
<voice 01030_00010478><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>So that means no ship be sailin' anymore. My family
don't even use that 'Sacred Sailor' title, it's not like
the old times no more.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10478.ja:
<voice 01030_00010478><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「つまり　そんな術　どこにもないってワケ。
　破邪舟使いの一族なんて肩書きも
　大昔ならともかく　今は使わないわよ～。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10478.ko:
<voice 01030_00010478><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 한마디로 그런 술법은 이제 아무 데도
　없단 뜻이야. 파사주사 일족이라는 간판도
　한참 예전에나 썼지 요새는 안 써~<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10478.zh-Hans:
<voice 01030_00010478><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>说白了吧，那法术已经失传了。
破邪舟术师一族这种头衔，
早就变成历史了，现在没人这么叫啦。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10478.zh-Hant:
<voice 01030_00010478><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>簡單來說，那法術已經失傳了。
過去就算了，現在老早沒人會
自稱是破邪舟術師一族了～<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10479.en: <voice 01070_00010479><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Aye, ye Gods...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10479.ja: <voice 01070_00010479><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「な　なんということじゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10479.ko: <voice 01070_00010479><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 어, 어찌 이런 일이…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10479.zh-Hans: <voice 01070_00010479><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>怎、怎么会这样……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10479.zh-Hant: <voice 01070_00010479><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>怎、怎麼會這樣……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10480.en:
<voice 01100_00010480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>The Sacred Ship technique has disappeared from
history... Umm, then it's all over.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10480.ja:
<voice 01100_00010480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「破邪舟の術は　歴史の中から
　消えてしまったというのか……。
　う～む　万事休すじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10480.ko:
<voice 01100_00010480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 파사주의 술법은
　역사 속으로 사라졌단 말인가…….
　흠…… 마지막 희망마저 꺾였군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10480.zh-Hans:
<voice 01100_00010480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>也就是说破邪舟之术
已经淹没在历史中了啊……
唉，无计可施了吗。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10480.zh-Hant:
<voice 01100_00010480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>所以破邪舟之術
已經從歷史中消失了嗎……
嗯～無計可施了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10481.ja: <voice 01170_00010481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……いや　待てよ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10481.zh-Hans: <voice 01170_00010481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……不对，等等。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10481.zh-Hant: <voice 01170_00010481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……不對，等等。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10482.en:
<voice 01220_00010482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ooh, that's it! I've got it! My wife already foresaw
this very thing!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10482.ja:
<voice 01220_00010482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おお　そうか！　そういうことか！
　わしの連れ合いは　このことまで
　ちゃんと　見抜いておったわ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10482.ko:
<voice 01220_00010482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 오오, 그래! 그런 거였어!
　내 아내는 이 상황까지 예지한 게야!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10482.zh-Hans:
<voice 01220_00010482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>啊，对啊！原来是这样啊！
我那老伴原来
连这件事都预知到了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10482.zh-Hant:
<voice 01220_00010482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>喔喔，原來如此！是這麼回事啊！
我那老伴連這件事
都看穿了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10483.en:
<voice 01301_00010483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Don't you see, <pc>. Do ye remember
the prophecy I just told ya?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10483.ja:
<voice 01301_00010483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「のう　<pc>よ。
　先ほど　わしが教えた予言を　覚えておるか？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10483.ko:
<voice 01301_00010483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이보게나, <pc>.
　아까 내가 가르쳐 준 예언을 기억하나?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10483.zh-Hans:
<voice 01301_00010483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
你还记得我刚才和你讲的那个预言么？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10483.zh-Hant:
<voice 01301_00010483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
還記得我剛才和你說的那個預言嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10484.en:
<voice 01334_00010484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That a shining Sacred Ship will cross time and ferry
the savior through the Great Darkness...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10484.ja:
<voice 01334_00010484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「輝ける破邪舟は　時の海を渡り
　救世主　大いなる闇を　越える……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10484.ko:
<voice 01334_00010484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 빛나는 파사주가 시간의 바다를 건너면
　구세주는 거대한 어둠을 넘는다…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10484.zh-Hans:
<voice 01334_00010484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>耀眼的破邪舟渡过时光之海，
救世主跨越巨大的黑暗……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10484.zh-Hant:
<voice 01334_00010484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>耀眼的破邪舟渡過時光之海，
救世主跨越巨大的黑暗……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10485.en:
<voice 01364_00010485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That crossing time part... The Sacred Ship technique
that was lost ta the present age; ya must go back to
the past ta revive it, that's what it meant...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10485.ja:
<voice 01364_00010485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「この　時の海を渡り……という一節は
　現代に失われた破邪舟を　過去にさかのぼり
　復活させることを　意味してたんじゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10485.ko:
<voice 01364_00010485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이 시간의 바다를 건넌다……는 구절은
　과거로 돌아가 현대에는 소실된 파사주를
　부활시키는 것을 의미하는 게야…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10485.zh-Hans:
<voice 01364_00010485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>渡过时光之海这一句，
正意味着要回到过去，
改变破邪舟失传的历史……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10485.zh-Hant:
<voice 01364_00010485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>渡過時光之海這一句……
正意味著要回到過去，
改變破邪舟失傳的歷史……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10486.en:
<voice 01435_00010486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya may not really believe this, yer face says as much.
However, <pc>, fer ya, it may be
possible!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10486.ja:
<voice 01435_00010486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「いかにも　信じられんといった顔じゃな。
　だがな　<pc>。
　おぬしがいれば　それも可能であろう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10486.ko:
<voice 01435_00010486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 못 믿겠다는 표정이로구먼.
　하지만, <pc>.
　자네가 있으면 가능하다네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10486.zh-Hans:
<voice 01435_00010486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>这听起来确实令人难以置信。
但只要有<pc>你在，
这一切就都有可能实现。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10486.zh-Hant:
<voice 01435_00010486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>看你一臉難以置信的表情。
但只要有<pc>你在，
這一切也不無可能吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001124.en:
<voice 01465_19001124><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya did use that time-travelin' technique on yer own
<kyodai_rel3> once...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001124.ja:
<voice 01465_19001124><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　自分の<kyodai_rel3>に　時渡りの術を使った
　おぬしならばな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001124.ko:
<voice 01465_19001124><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 예전에 가족에게 시간 건너기 술법을
　썼던 자네라면 말일세….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001124.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_19001124><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾经对自己的<kyodai_rel3>
施展过渡时之术的呀……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001124.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_19001124><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾經對自己的<kyodai_rel3>
施展過渡時之術的呀……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001125.en:
<voice 01465_19001125><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya did use that time-travelin' technique on yer own
<kyodai_rel3> once...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001125.ja:
<voice 01465_19001125><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　自分の<kyodai_rel3>に　時渡りの術を使った
　おぬしならばな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001125.ko:
<voice 01465_19001125><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 예전에 가족에게 시간 건너기 술법을
　썼던 자네라면 말일세…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001125.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_19001125><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾经对自己的<kyodai_rel3>
施展过渡时之术的呀……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001125.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_19001125><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾經對自己的<kyodai_rel3>
施展過渡時之術的呀……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001126.en:
<voice 01465_19001126><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya did use that time-travelin' technique on yer own
<kyodai_rel3> once...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001126.ja:
<voice 01465_19001126><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　自分の<kyodai_rel3>に　時渡りの術を使った
　おぬしならばな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001126.ko:
<voice 01465_19001126><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 예전에 가족에게 시간 건너기 술법을

<kyodai_rel3> once...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001127.ja:
<voice 01465_19001127><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　自分の<kyodai_rel3>に　時渡りの術を使った
　おぬしならばな……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001127.ko:
<voice 01465_19001127><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 예전에 가족에게 시간 건너기 술법을
　썼던 자네라면 말일세…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001127.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_19001127><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾经对自己的<kyodai_rel3>

19001127.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_19001127><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你可是曾經對自己的<kyodai_rel3>

10488.en:
<voice 01495_00010488><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>But ta use that power, ya gotta return back ta human
form. Since yer body's original owner was from
another race.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10488.ja:
<voice 01495_00010488><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「だが　そのチカラを　使うために
　おぬしは　人間の姿を取り戻す必要がある。
　その身体の持ち主は　別の種族の者だからな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10488.ko:
<voice 01495_00010488><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 힘을 사용하려면
　자네가 인간의 몸을 되찾아야만 하네.
　그 몸의 원래 주인은 다른 종족이니 말일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10488.zh-Hans:
<voice 01495_00010488><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但是，只有人类才能使用那种力量。
你现在使用的身体属于其他种族，
必须要先恢复成人类才行。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10488.zh-Hant:
<voice 01495_00010488><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但是只有人類才能使用那種力量。
你現在使用的身體屬於其他種族，
必須要先恢復成人類才行。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10489.en:
<voice 01575_00010489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Never fear. Yer true form still exists in yer hometown,
Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10489.ja:
<voice 01575_00010489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「案ずるでない。おぬしの真の姿は
　故郷　エテーネの村に　今も存在しておる。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10489.ko:
<voice 01575_00010489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 걱정할 것 없네. 자네의 원래 몸은
　지금도 고향 에테네 마을에 잘 있으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10489.zh-Hans:
<voice 01575_00010489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不必担心，你真正的身体
一直在你的故乡伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10489.zh-Hant:
<voice 01575_00010489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不必擔心，你真正的形態
一直在你的故鄉伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001128.en:
<voice 01576_19001128><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Oi, wait a minute, I don't get what that geezer is
talking about at all. Crossing time and true forms
or whatever...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001128.ja:
<voice 01576_19001128><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「おいおい　じいさん
　言ってる事が　さっぱりなんだが。
　トキワタリとか　真の姿とか……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001128.ko:
<voice 01576_19001128><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 아니, 영감님.
　무슨 소린지 도통 못 알아듣겠는데.
　시간 건너기라는 둥 원래 몸이라는둥…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001128.zh-Hans:
<voice 01576_19001128><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂喂，老爷爷，
我完全听不懂你在说什么。
什么渡时还是真正的形态……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001128.zh-Hant:
<voice 01576_19001128><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>喂喂，老爺爺，
我完全聽不懂你在說什麼。
什麼渡時還是真正的形態……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001129.en: <voice 01577_19001129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc> is just <pc>, right?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001129.ja:
<voice 01577_19001129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「<pc>さまは
　<pc>さま　でしょう？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001129.ko:
<voice 01577_19001129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님은
　<pc> 님이잖아요?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001129.zh-Hans:
<voice 01577_19001129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人就是
<pc>大人吧？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001129.zh-Hant:
<voice 01577_19001129><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人就是
<pc>大人吧？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001130.en:
<voice 01578_19001130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Nay. This <pc>, despite being *a*
<pc>, is not *the* <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001130.ja:
<voice 01578_19001130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「いいや。今の　<pc>は
　<pc>にして　<pc>にあらず。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001130.ko:
<voice 01578_19001130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 아니, 지금의 {pc}|hpp(은,는)
　{pc}|hpp(이면,면)서 {pc}|hpp(이,가) 아니라네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001130.zh-Hans:
<voice 01578_19001130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不，现在的<pc>
虽然是<pc>，却也不是<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001130.zh-Hant:
<voice 01578_19001130><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不，現在的<pc>
雖然是<pc>，卻也不是<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001131.en:
<voice 01579_19001131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Once before, the Netherlord Nergel had destroyed the
human village of Ethene, and one of those souls now
resides in another's body that met with a terrible end.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001131.ja:
<voice 01579_19001131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かつて　冥王ネルゲルに滅ぼされた
　人間の村　エテーネの民の魂が
　不幸な死をとげた者の　肉体に宿った……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001131.ko:
<voice 01579_19001131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 과거, 명왕 네르겔의 손에 멸망한
　인간 마을 에테네 사람의 혼이
　불행한 죽음을 맞은 이의 육체에 깃든……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001131.zh-Hans:
<voice 01579_19001131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>人类村子——伊甸在过去遭到冥王内尔格尔毁灭，
其子民的灵魂附身到
不幸丧命之人的肉体上……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001131.zh-Hant:
<voice 01579_19001131><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>人類村子──伊甸在過去遭到冥王內爾格爾毀滅，
其子民的靈魂附身到
不幸喪命之人的肉體上……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001132.en: <voice 01580_19001132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Somethin' o' a 'reincarnation', so ta speak.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001132.ja: <voice 01580_19001132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「いわば　『生き返し』を　受けたものじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001132.ko: <voice 01580_19001132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그러니까 『부활』의 술법을 받은 자라네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001132.zh-Hans: <voice 01580_19001132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>也就是“起死回生”之人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001132.zh-Hant: <voice 01580_19001132><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>也就是「起死回生」之人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001133.en:
<voice 01581_19001133><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Re... Incar... Nation? What the heck are ya sayin'!?
I don't get it at all!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001133.ja:
<voice 01581_19001133><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「い……行き……帰り？
　ですってッ！？
　さっぱり　わけわかんねーですッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001133.ko:
<voice 01581_19001133><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 부…… 부……? 활?
　그게 무슨 소리죠!?
　도무지 이해가 안 되는데요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001133.zh-Hans:
<voice 01581_19001133><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>起……起司……花生？
你在说什么？！
真是搞得我一头雾水！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001133.zh-Hant:
<voice 01581_19001133><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>起……起司……花生？
你在說什麼！？
真是搞得我一頭霧水！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001134.en:
<voice 01582_19001134><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>He's saying that the inside of <pc>
isn't <pc>, but another... Person...
Is that he means?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001134.ja:
<voice 01582_19001134><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「それって　<pc>さまの中身は
　<pc>さまじゃない
　別の……人間……ってこと？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001134.ko:
<voice 01582_19001134><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 그 말씀은 <pc> 님 속에
　<pc> 님이 아닌
　다른…… 인간……이 있다는 뜻인가요?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001134.zh-Hans:
<voice 01582_19001134><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>所以，<pc>大人的内在
并不是<pc>大人，
而是……其他人……是吗？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001134.zh-Hant:
<voice 01582_19001134><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>所以，<pc>大人的內在
並不是<pc>大人，
而是……其他人……是嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001135.en:
<voice 01583_19001135><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>...I see. Back in Julet I thought maybe that,
<pc>, I had really killed the true
you...<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001135.ja:
<voice 01583_19001135><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「……そうか　ジュレットで　もしやと思ったが
　<pc>　オレは　本当のお前を
　やっぱり　殺しちまってたんだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001135.ko:
<voice 01583_19001135><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: ……주레트에서도 그런 생각이 들긴 했지만
　<pc>, 역시 내가 진짜 너를
　죽인 게 맞았군…….<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001135.zh-Hans:
<voice 01583_19001135><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……原来如此，在玖莱特我就有想过是不是这样了，
<pc>，我果然还是杀了
真正的你吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001135.zh-Hant:
<voice 01583_19001135><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>……原來如此，在玖萊特我就有想過是不是這樣了，
<pc>，我果然還是殺了
真正的你吧……<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001136.en:
<voice 01585_19001136><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Who believes in a story they just heard, right...
Besides I didn't even know the person before ya was
reincarnated or whatever, so it don't matter!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001136.ja:
<voice 01585_19001136><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「にわかには　信じられねー話ですねッ。
　……まぁ　わしは　生き返し前の奴のことなんぞ
　知らねーんで　どうでも良いですッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001136.ko:
<voice 01585_19001136><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 당장은 믿기 어려운 얘기네요.
　……뭐, 부활 전에 어떤 녀석이었는지
　하나도 몰라서 상관없긴 하지만요!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001136.zh-Hans:
<voice 01585_19001136><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>实在很难立刻就相信呢。
……不过，我和起死回生前的他完全不熟，
所以无所谓！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001136.zh-Hant:
<voice 01585_19001136><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>實在很難立刻就相信呢。
……不過，我完全不熟起死回生前的他，
所以無所謂！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001137.en:
<voice 01605_19001137><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now, my spell will send <pc>'s soul
back ta Ethene Village where you can regain yer
human form.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001137.ja:
<voice 01605_19001137><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「これから　わしの呪文で　<pc>の魂を
　エテーネの村まで　送りとどけてやるから
　おぬしは　人間の姿を取り戻すのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001137.ko:
<voice 01605_19001137><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 지금부터 나의 주문으로 <pc>의 혼을
　에테네 마을로 보낼 테니
　자네는 인간의 모습을 되찾도록 하게.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001137.zh-Hans:
<voice 01605_19001137><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>接下来我会用咒文
把<pc>的灵魂送回伊甸村，
你要去找回自己人类的形态。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001137.zh-Hant:
<voice 01605_19001137><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>接下來我會用咒文
把<pc>的靈魂送回伊甸村，
你要去找回自己人類的形態。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001138.en:
<voice 01606_19001138><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc> and you who fight alongside, ya
all can't go ta Ethene. It's best ye just sort out
yer feelings.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001138.ja:
<voice 01606_19001138><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「<pc>と　共に闘う者らよ。
　おぬしらは　エテーネには行けぬ。
　心の整理でも　しているが良かろう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001138.ko:
<voice 01606_19001138><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(과,와) 함께 싸우는 자들이여.
　자네들은 에테네로는 갈 수 없다네.
　마음이라도 정리하고 있는 게 좋겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001138.zh-Hans:
<voice 01606_19001138><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>与<pc>并肩作战的人们啊，
你们无法前往伊甸。
最好先有个心理准备。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001138.zh-Hant:
<voice 01606_19001138><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>與<pc>並肩作戰的人們啊，
你們無法前往伊甸。
最好先有個心理準備。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10491.en:
<voice 01635_00010491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>'Kay, <pc>, I'll wait here. When yer ready
to go, come back here.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10491.ja:
<voice 01635_00010491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よいか　<pc>。
　わしは　ここで待っておる。
　準備ができたら　ふたたび　ここへ来てくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10491.ko:
<voice 01635_00010491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 알았나? <pc>.
　난 이곳에서 기다리겠네.
　준비를 마치거든 다시 이곳으로 오게나.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10491.zh-Hans:
<voice 01635_00010491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>就这样定了，<pc>。
我就等在这儿，
你准备好了就过来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10491.zh-Hant:
<voice 01635_00010491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>聽好了，<pc>。
我就在這裡等著。
準備好了就過來找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10492.en:
<voice 01675_00010492><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>Ey～. Ya can't go barkin' orders without my permission.
This is my house～.<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10492.ja:
<voice 01675_00010492><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>「え～。なに　勝手に決めてんのよ～？
　ここ　私の家なんですけど～。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10492.ko:
<voice 01675_00010492><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>: 뭐~? 그런 걸 왜 마음대로 정해~?
　여긴 우리 집이라고~<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10492.zh-Hans:
<voice 01675_00010492><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>喂，你还真不当自己是外人，
这里可是我家哎。<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10492.zh-Hant:
<voice 01675_00010492><start_lip_sync n00804 _normal m00001>咦～你怎麼擅自決定啊～？
這裡可是我家耶～<stop_lip_animation n00804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10493.en:
<voice 01725_00010493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Haha. It'd be nice if <pc> could change yer
lazy bum while they're altering the past, right.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10493.ja:
<voice 01725_00010493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ふふ。おまえの　ものぐさな根性も
　<pc>が　過去を変えたついでに
　変わればよいのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10493.ko:
<voice 01725_00010493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 후후, {pc}|hpp(이,가) 과거를 바꾸면
　자네의 그 게으른 성격도
　같이 바뀌면 좋겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10493.zh-Hans:
<voice 01725_00010493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>唉，<pc>去改变历史的时候，
要是能顺便把你这懒惰的性情
也一起修正了就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10493.zh-Hant:
<voice 01725_00010493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵，等<pc>去改變歷史時，
要是能順便把妳那懶惰的性情
也改一改就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001139.en:
<voice 01815_19001139><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ethene Village has fallen into Nergel's hands, so
there's no telling what could happen. Hold tight and
prepare yourself.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001139.ja:
<voice 01815_19001139><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ネルゲルの手に落ちた　エテーネの村では
　何が起こるか　わからんからのう。
　しっかり　準備をととのえてくるんじゃぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001139.ko:
<voice 01815_19001139><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 네르겔이 차지한 에테네 마을에서는
　무슨 일이 벌어질지 모른다네.
　준비를 단단히 해 두는 게 좋을 게야.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001139.zh-Hans:
<voice 01815_19001139><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>落入内尔格尔手中的伊甸村
不知道会发生什么。
你可要做好充分准备啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001139.zh-Hant:
<voice 01815_19001139><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>落入內爾格爾手中的伊甸村
不曉得會發生什麼事。
你可要確實做好準備啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10512.en: <voice 00095_00010512><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Are ya ready to go to the village of Ethene?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10512.ja:
<voice 00095_00010512><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「エテーネの村に　行く準備は
　できたかな？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10512.ko: <voice 00095_00010512><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 에테네 마을에 갈 준비는 됐나?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10512.zh-Hans:
<voice 00095_00010512><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>前往伊甸村的准备
做好了没有啊？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10512.zh-Hant:
<voice 00095_00010512><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>前往伊甸村的準備
做好了嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001140.en:
<voice 00175_19001140><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I see. We don't know what will happen there. Make
sure you're prepared.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001140.ja:
<voice 00175_19001140><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「そうか。
　これから先　何が起きるか　わからん。
　しっかり　準備をととのえてくるんじゃぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001140.ko:
<voice 00175_19001140><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그렇군.
　앞으로 무슨 일이 벌어질지 모르지.
　준비를 단단히 해 두는 게 좋을 게야.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001140.zh-Hans:
<voice 00175_19001140><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>这样啊。
接下来不知道会发生什么。
你可要做好充分准备啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001140.zh-Hant:
<voice 00175_19001140><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>這樣啊。
接下來不曉得會發生什麼事。
你可要確實做好準備啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10514.en:
<voice 00135_00010514><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Alright. I will now fly yer soul to your hometown,
Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10514.ja:
<voice 00135_00010514><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よし。それでは　これから
　おぬしの故郷である　エテーネの村まで
　おぬしの魂を　飛ばしてやろう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10514.ko:
<voice 00135_00010514><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 그럼 이제부터
　자네의 고향인 에테네 마을로
　자네의 영혼을 보내주도록 하겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10514.zh-Hans:
<voice 00135_00010514><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好的，那么我这就动手，
把你的灵魂送回
故乡伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10514.zh-Hant:
<voice 00135_00010514><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好的，那麼我這就動手，
把你的靈魂送回
故鄉伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001141.en:
<voice 00136_19001141><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Souls only on this trip. Say goodbye to your friends
for now.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001141.ja:
<voice 00136_19001141><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「魂だけ　じゃからのう。
　仲間とは　しばし　お別れじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001141.ko:
<voice 00136_19001141><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 영혼만일세.
　동료들과는 잠시 이별하게 되겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001141.zh-Hans:
<voice 00136_19001141><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>毕竟就只有灵魂。
要暂时与伙伴分开了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001141.zh-Hant:
<voice 00136_19001141><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>畢竟就只有靈魂。
要暫時與夥伴分開了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001142.en:
<pc> temporarily parted ways with
their companions.
19001142.ja:
<pc>は
仲間たちと　一時的に別れた。

10515.en:
<voice 00245_00010515><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I avoided doin' so out of fear that the Netherlord
Nergel would find out, but I'd say there's no backing
down now...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10515.ja:
<voice 00245_00010515><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「冥王ネルゲルに　こちらの動きを
　読まれる恐れがあるため　さけていたが
　もう　そんなことは言っておれん。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10515.ko:
<voice 00245_00010515><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 명왕 네르겔에게 우리의 움직임을
　들킬 것을 우려해서 삼갔네만
　이젠 그런 걸 따질 때가 아니지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10515.zh-Hans:
<voice 00245_00010515><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>为了不让冥王内尔格尔识破我们的意图，
我一直不敢走这一步。
但是现在顾不上那么多了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10515.zh-Hant:
<voice 00245_00010515><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>為了不讓冥王內爾格爾識破我們的意圖，
我一直不敢走這一步。
但是現在顧不上那麼多了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001483.en:
<voice 00486_19001483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Alright, <pc>, I'll say it one more
time. Yer human form's where I'm sendin' ye now,
Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001483.ja:
<voice 00486_19001483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よいか　<pc>。もう一度　言うぞ。
　おぬしの　人間としての姿は
　これから行く　エテーネの村にある。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001483.ko:
<voice 00486_19001483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 다시 한번 말할 테니 잘 듣게, <pc>.
　인간인 자네의 원래 몸은
　이제부터 갈 에테네 마을에 있네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001483.zh-Hans:
<voice 00486_19001483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你听好，<pc>。
我再说一遍，你那人类的身体
就在你即将前往的伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001483.zh-Hant:
<voice 00486_19001483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你聽好，<pc>。
我再說一遍，你那人類的形態
就在你即將前往的伊甸村。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10517.en:
<voice 00516_00010517><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Now's the time ta take back yer true form! Cross time
and revive the Sacred Ship; fulfill the mission only
you can do!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10517.ja:
<voice 00516_00010517><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「今こそ　その真の姿を　取り戻すときじゃ。
　時を超え　破邪舟を復活させるという
　おぬしにしか　できぬ使命を果たすためにな！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10517.ko:
<voice 00516_00010517><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 지금이 바로 자네의 진짜 모습을 되찾을 때네.
　시간을 뛰어넘어 파사주를 부활시킨다는
　자네만이 할 수 있는 사명을 완수하기 위해!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10517.zh-Hans:
<voice 00516_00010517><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>穿越时空复活破邪舟，
这个使命只有你能达成。
因此现在你必须找回真正的身体。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10517.zh-Hant:
<voice 00516_00010517><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>穿越時空復活破邪舟，
這個使命只有你能達成。
因此現在你必須取回真正的形態！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10518.en:
<voice 00886_00010518><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...It'll be hard ta see the devastation of the village
where you were born and raised, however...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10518.ja:
<voice 00886_00010518><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……生まれ育った村の　惨状を見るのは
　つらいことかもしれんが……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10518.ko:
<voice 00886_00010518><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……나고 자란 고향의 참상을
　마주하는 것이 고통스럽겠지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10518.zh-Hans:
<voice 00886_00010518><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……看到自己故乡现在的惨状，
或许你会很伤心……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10518.zh-Hant:
<voice 00886_00010518><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……看到自己故鄉現在的慘狀，
或許你會很難受……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10519.en:
<voice 00916_00010519><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I'm counting on you, <pc>! The fate
of the world is in yer hands...!!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10519.ja:
<voice 00916_00010519><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「頼んだぞ　<pc>……！
　世界の命運は　おぬしに　かかっておる……！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10519.ko:
<voice 00916_00010519><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 부탁하겠네, <pc>……!
　세계의 운명이 자네에게 달렸네……!!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10519.zh-Hans:
<voice 00916_00010519><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但只能拜托你了，<pc>！
整个世界的命运都赌在你的身上！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10519.zh-Hant:
<voice 00916_00010519><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但只能拜託你了，<pc>……！
整個世界的命運都賭在你的身上……！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10520.ja: <voice 00961_00010520><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「かああああああぁぁぁぁぁぁぁっ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10520.zh-Hant: <voice 00961_00010520><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>喝啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10521.en: <voice 00555_00010521><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>Well done... I'm so glad to see that you've returned.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10521.ja: <voice 00555_00010521><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「よくぞ……よくぞ　戻ってきたのう。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10521.ko: <voice 00555_00010521><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 정말…… 정말 잘 돌아왔다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10521.zh-Hans: <voice 00555_00010521><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>太好了……你终于回来了。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10521.zh-Hant: <voice 00555_00010521><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>太好了……你終於回來了。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10522.en:
<voice 00585_00010522><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>Even after death, I've been patiently waiting here
for your return. Welcome home, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10522.ja:
<voice 00585_00010522><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「死して後も　わしは　こうして
　ずっと　お前を待っておったのじゃ。
　おかえり　<pc>や。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10522.ko:
<voice 00585_00010522><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 난 죽은 후에도 이렇게 계속
　네가 돌아오길 기다렸다.
　어서 와라, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10522.zh-Hans:
<voice 00585_00010522><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>虽然我已经死了，
但我一直守在这里等你。
欢迎回家，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10522.zh-Hant:
<voice 00585_00010522><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>雖然我已經死了，
但我一直守在這裡等你。
歡迎回來，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32273.en:
<voice 00622_00032273><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>Finally, the day has come when I can tell you about
this...<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32273.ja:
<voice 00622_00032273><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「ようやく　お前に
　このことを　話せる日が来た……。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32273.ko:
<voice 00622_00032273><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 드디어 네게
　이 이야기를 할 수 있는 날이 왔구나…….<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32273.zh-Hans:
<voice 00622_00032273><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>总算到了可以跟你说
这件事的时候了……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32273.zh-Hant:
<voice 00622_00032273><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>總算到了可以跟你說
這件事的時候了……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10523.en:
<voice 00633_00010523><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>When I was still a child, a young alchemist came to
this village and saved me from the brink of death with
a mysterious technique.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10523.ja:
<voice 00633_00010523><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「わしが　まだ幼い頃　ひとりの若い錬金術師が 
　この村を訪れ　死にかけていた　わしと
　この村を　不思議な技で救ってくれたのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10523.ko:
<voice 00633_00010523><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 내가 어렸을 적에 한 젊은 연금술사가
　우리 마을을 찾아와 죽을 위기에 처한 나와
　이 마을을 신비한 술법으로 구해주었다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10523.zh-Hans:
<voice 00633_00010523><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>在我年幼时，一位年轻的炼金术师来到村子里。
那个人用神奇的本事，
拯救了当时生命垂危的我以及整个村子。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10523.zh-Hant:
<voice 00633_00010523><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>在我年幼時，一位年輕的鍊金術師來到村子裡。
那個人用神奇的本事，
拯救了當時生命垂危的我以及整個村子。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32274.en:
<voice 00644_00032274><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>That person was sent back far into the past to escape
Ethene and its people's doomed fate...<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32274.ja:
<voice 00644_00032274><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「その者は　時渡りの術で 
　遠き未来より　過去に飛ばされ
　滅びの運命を逃れえた　エテーネの民……。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32274.ko:
<voice 00644_00032274><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 그자는 시간 건너기 술법으로 
　먼 미래에서 과거로 날아 온 덕분에
　멸망의 운명에서 벗어난 에테네 주민…….<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32274.zh-Hans:
<voice 00644_00032274><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>那个人是伊甸之民，
通过渡时之术从遥远未来
飞到过去，逃过毁灭的命运……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32274.zh-Hant:
<voice 00644_00032274><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>那個人是伊甸子民，
透過渡時之術從遙遠未來
飛到過去，逃過毀滅的命運……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001143.en:
<voice 00655_19001143><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...That's right. That alchemist was your <kyodai_rel3>.
I've known since they were born that they were that
same alchemist.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001143.ja:
<voice 00655_19001143><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……そう。お前の<kyodai_rel3>のことじゃ。
　わしは　<kyodai>が　生まれた時から
　あやつこそ　あの錬金術師だと気づいておった。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001143.ko:
<voice 00655_19001143><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……그래. 네 가족 말이다.
　나는 {kyodai}|hpp(이,가) 태어났을 때부터
　그 아이가 바로 그 연금술사라는 걸 깨달았지.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001143.zh-Hans:
<voice 00655_19001143><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……对，那个炼金术师就是你的<kyodai_rel3>。
自打<kyodai>出生之时起，
我就已经意识到这就是那位炼金术师。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001143.zh-Hant:
<voice 00655_19001143><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……沒錯，就是你的<kyodai_rel3>。
我從<kyodai>出生以來，
就注意到他就是那位鍊金術師。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001144.en:
<voice 00655_19001144><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...That's right. That alchemist was your <kyodai_rel3>.
I've known since they were born that they were that
same alchemist.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001144.ja:
<voice 00655_19001144><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……そう。お前の<kyodai_rel3>のことじゃ。
　わしは　<kyodai>が　生まれた時から
　あやつこそ　あの錬金術師だと気づいておった。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001144.ko:
<voice 00655_19001144><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……그래. 네 가족 말이다.
　나는 {kyodai}|hpp(이,가) 태어났을 때부터
　그 아이가 바로 그 연금술사라는 걸 깨달았지.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001144.zh-Hans:
<voice 00655_19001144><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……对，那个炼金术师就是你的<kyodai_rel3>。
自打<kyodai>出生之时起，
我就已经意识到这就是那位炼金术师。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001144.zh-Hant:
<voice 00655_19001144><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……沒錯，就是你的<kyodai_rel3>。
我從<kyodai>出生以來，
就注意到他就是那位鍊金術師。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001147.en:
<voice 00665_19001147><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>And the time traveler that had sent them back in time
was none other than you, <pc_rel2>...<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001147.ja:
<voice 00665_19001147><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「そして　あれを過去に送った　時渡りの術者が
　<pc_rel2>である　お前だということにもな……。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001147.ko:
<voice 00665_19001147><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 그 아이를 과거로 보낸 시간 건너기 술사가
　가족인 너라는 것도 말이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001147.zh-Hans:
<voice 00665_19001147><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>而使用渡时之术把那个人送回过去的，
正是身为<pc_rel2>的你……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001147.zh-Hant:
<voice 00665_19001147><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>而使用渡時之術把那個人送回過去的，
正是身為<pc_rel2>的你……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001148.en:
<voice 00665_19001148><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>And the time traveler that had sent them back in time
