32275.en:
<voice 00675_00032275><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>As I watched you two grow, I sensed the impending
doom that alchemist once spoke of.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32275.ja:
<voice 00675_00032275><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「お前たちの成長を見守りながら　わしは
　かつて　錬金術師が語った　滅びの運命が
　我らに近づいていると　悟ったのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32275.ko:
<voice 00675_00032275><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 너희의 성장을 지켜보며
　난 지난날 연금술사가 말한 멸망의 운명이
　우리에게 다가오고 있다는 걸 깨달았다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32275.zh-Hans:
<voice 00675_00032275><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>我看着你们的成长，领悟到
过去炼金术师所说的话，毁灭的
命运正向我们逼近。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32275.zh-Hant:
<voice 00675_00032275><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>我看著你們的成長，領悟到
過去鍊金術師所說的話，毀滅的
命運正向我們逼近。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10526.en:
<voice 00691_00010526><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...Now, please follow me. I know exactly why you are
here. Everything that has happened has led up to this
fateful day.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10526.ja:
<voice 00691_00010526><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……さあ　ついてくるがよい。
　お前が　帰ってきた目的は　わかっておる。
　すべては　今日のためにあったのじゃからな。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10526.ko:
<voice 00691_00010526><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……자, 따라오거라.
　네가 돌아온 이유는 이미 알고 있다.
　그 모든 나날은 오늘을 위해 존재했던 거니까.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10526.zh-Hans:
<voice 00691_00010526><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……跟我来吧。
我很清楚你回来的目的，
因为一切都是为了今天啊。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10526.zh-Hant:
<voice 00691_00010526><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……跟我來吧。
我很清楚你回來的目的，
因為一切都是為了今天啊。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10527.en:
<voice 01295_00010527><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>As you see, the Galapogod was protecting your soulless
body.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10527.ja:
<voice 01295_00010527><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「この通り　魂の抜けた　お前の身体を
　カメさまが　守っていてくださったのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10527.ko:
<voice 01295_00010527><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 보다시피 영혼이 빠져나간 네 몸을
　거북님께서 이렇게 지켜주고 계셨다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10527.zh-Hans:
<voice 01295_00010527><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>你的灵魂离开后，
乌龟大人就一直这样守护着你的身体。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10527.zh-Hant:
<voice 01295_00010527><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>你的靈魂離開後，
烏龜大人就一直這樣守護著你的身體。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10528.en:
<voice 01331_00010528><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>When you touch your body, your soul shall naturally
be reunited with it. Go on, dear.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10528.ja:
<voice 01331_00010528><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「この身体に触れれば　お前の魂は
　自然と　元に戻るはず。
　さあ　触れてみるが　よいぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10528.ko:
<voice 01331_00010528><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 이 몸과 접촉하면 네 영혼은
　자연히 원래 몸으로 돌아갈 것이다.
　자, 가까이 가 보거라.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10528.zh-Hans:
<voice 01331_00010528><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>只要接触到身体，
你的灵魂自然就会归位。
来吧，试试看。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10528.zh-Hant:
<voice 01331_00010528><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>只要接觸到身體，
你的靈魂自然就會歸位。
來吧，試試看。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10529.en:
<voice 01679_00010529><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...Ohh, you're back! You're really back,
<pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10529.ja:
<voice 01679_00010529><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……おおっ　戻った！
　戻ったぞ　<pc>っ！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10529.ko:
<voice 01679_00010529><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……오오, 돌아왔어!
　돌아왔구나, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10529.zh-Hans:
<voice 01679_00010529><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……哦哦，变回来了！
你变回来了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10529.zh-Hant:
<voice 01679_00010529><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……喔喔，變回來了！
你變回來了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10530.en:
<voice 01711_00010530><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>I was sure this would happen, but... Until I saw it
with my own eyes, I had my doubts.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10530.ja:
<voice 01711_00010530><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「こうなると　わかってはいたが……
　やはり　この目で見るまでは　不安じゃったよ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10530.ko:
<voice 01711_00010530><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 이리 되리란 걸 머리로는 알았지만……
　역시 직접 보기 전까지는 불안했거든.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10530.zh-Hans:
<voice 01711_00010530><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>虽然我早就知道会这样……
但亲眼目睹之前，多少都有些忐忑。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10530.zh-Hant:
<voice 01711_00010530><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>雖然我早就知道會這樣……
但親眼目睹之前，多少都有些忐忑。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10531.en:
<voice 01750_00010531><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>All that's left is to wait for the Galapogod to awaken
so that he can help us...<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10531.ja:
<voice 01750_00010531><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「さあ　あとは　カメさまに目覚めていただき
　おチカラを　お借りすれば……。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10531.ko:
<voice 01750_00010531><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 자, 이제 거북님을 깨워
　힘을 빌리기만 하면…….<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10531.zh-Hans:
<voice 01750_00010531><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>接下来只要唤醒乌龟大人，
借助它的力量……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10531.zh-Hant:
<voice 01750_00010531><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>接下來只要喚醒烏龜大人，
借助牠的力量……<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10532.en:
<voice 01790_00010532><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>So, it seems you've awakened
your human form once more...<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10532.ja:
<voice 01790_00010532><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　人の姿を　取り戻したか。
　いまわしき　エテーネの生き残りよ。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10532.ko:
<voice 01790_00010532><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　인간의 몸을 되찾았나.
　눈엣가시 같은 에테네의 생존자여.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10532.zh-Hans:
<voice 01790_00010532><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>你找回了人类的形态啊，
可恶的伊甸遗民。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10532.zh-Hant:
<voice 01790_00010532><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>你取回了人類的形態啊，
可惡的伊甸倖存者。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10533.en:
<voice 01840_00010533><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>However, this land is already under my control, and
nothing escapes my, Netherlord Nergel's, gaze...<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10533.ja:
<voice 01840_00010533><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　だが　この地は　すでに我の支配下。
　ここで起こることは　すべて
　冥王ネルゲルの知るところ……。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10533.ko:
<voice 01840_00010533><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　하지만 이 땅은 이미 내 손에 떨어졌다.
　이곳에서 일어나는 일은
　모두 명왕 네르겔의 손바닥 안…….<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10533.zh-Hans:
<voice 01840_00010533><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>但是这里的一切
都已归我所有，没有任何事
能瞒得过我冥王内尔格尔……<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10533.zh-Hant:
<voice 01840_00010533><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>但是這裡的一切
都已歸我所有，沒有任何事
能瞞得過我冥王內爾格爾……<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10534.en:
<voice 02091_00010534><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>My flames of darkness shall eventually
consume all. You cannot escape my wrath.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10534.ja:
<voice 02091_00010534><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　我が　闇の炎輪は　
　その内にあるものを　焼き尽くす。
　貴様に　逃れる術はないと知れ。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10534.ko:
<voice 02091_00010534><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>　내 어둠의 화염 고리는
　그 안에 있는 모든 것을 불사른다.
　네가 빠져나갈 방법은 없다.<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10534.zh-Hans:
<voice 02091_00010534><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>我的暗之炎轮可以将
围在其中的一切焚烧殆尽，
你是不可能逃出去的。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10534.zh-Hant:
<voice 02091_00010534><start_lip_sync m50029 _normal m00001><center>我的闇之炎輪可以將
圍在其中的一切焚燒殆盡，
你是不可能逃出去的。<stop_lip_animation m50029 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10535.en:
<voice 02250_00010535><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...So it's come down to this, has it. It seems that
the omens were right all along.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10535.ja:
<voice 02250_00010535><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……こういうことか。
　やはり　お告げは　正しかったようじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10535.ko:
<voice 02250_00010535><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……그런 거였나.
　역시 계시는 틀리지 않았던 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10535.zh-Hans:
<voice 02250_00010535><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……原来是这样啊。
预言里所说的果然不错。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10535.zh-Hant:
<voice 02250_00010535><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……原來是這樣啊。
預言裡所說的果然沒錯。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10536.en:
<voice 02360_00010536><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>You remember, don't you, <pc>? That
day I asked you to go pick the Tens Flower.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10536.ja:
<voice 02360_00010536><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「覚えておるか　<pc>？
　あの日　わしに頼まれて
　お前が採ってきた　テンスの花じゃよ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10536.ko:
<voice 02360_00010536><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 기억나느냐, <pc>?
　그날 내 부탁으로
　네가 꺾어 온 텐스 꽃이다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10536.zh-Hans:
<voice 02360_00010536><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001><pc>，你还记得这个么？
那天，你受我之托
前去采来的泰恩斯之花。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10536.zh-Hant:
<voice 02360_00010536><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001><pc>，你還記得這個嗎？
那天，你受我之託
前去採來的泰恩斯之花。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10537.en: <voice 02490_00010537><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>Well, now is finally the time to use it!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10537.ja: <voice 02490_00010537><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「今こそ　これを使うべきときが　来たのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10537.ko: <voice 02490_00010537><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 지금이 바로 이 꽃을 쓸 때다!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10537.zh-Hans: <voice 02490_00010537><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>现在正是它派上用场的时候！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10537.zh-Hant: <voice 02490_00010537><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>現在正是它派上用場的時候！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10538.en: <voice 03200_00010538><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...<pc>, many hardships lie ahead of you.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10538.ja:
<voice 03200_00010538><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……<pc>。
　これからも　お前の行く先には
　多くの苦難が　待ち受けておるじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10538.ko:
<voice 03200_00010538><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>.
　앞으로도 네가 나아갈 길에는
　수많은 고난이 기다리고 있을 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10538.zh-Hans:
<voice 03200_00010538><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……<pc>。
你的未来依然会
充满艰难险阻。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10538.zh-Hant:
<voice 03200_00010538><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……<pc>，
你的未來依然會
充滿艱難險阻。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10539.en:
<voice 03246_00010539><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>Please forgive me for knowing that all of this would
happen and not being able to help you.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10539.ja:
<voice 03246_00010539><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「それを知りながら　もはや
　なんの手助けもしてやれない
　わしのことを　許しておくれよ。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10539.ko:
<voice 03246_00010539><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 그걸 알면서도
　아무 도움도 주지 못하는 날
　부디 용서해다오.<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10539.zh-Hans:
<voice 03246_00010539><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>而我虽知如此，
却再也没有办法帮助你了。
希望你能够原谅我。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10539.zh-Hant:
<voice 03246_00010539><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>而我明知如此，
卻再也沒有辦法幫助你了。
希望你能夠原諒我。<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10540.en:
<voice 03290_00010540><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>But you... The child of the Galapagod,
<pc>, will surely get through this; I believe it!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10540.ja:
<voice 03290_00010540><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「だが　お前なら……
　カメさまの申し子である　<pc>なら
　きっと　乗り越えてくれると信じておるぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10540.ko:
<voice 03290_00010540><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: 하지만 너라면……
　거북님의 선택을 받은 <pc> 너라면
　반드시 이겨내리라고 믿는다!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10540.zh-Hans:
<voice 03290_00010540><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>但<pc>你……
你是乌龟大人最爱的孩子，
一定能够克服一切困难！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10540.zh-Hant:
<voice 03290_00010540><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>但<pc>你……
你是烏龜大人最愛的孩子，
一定能夠克服一切困難！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10541.en:
<voice 03335_00010541><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>...Farewell, <pc>. Don't worry about
me, get going! You must defeat Netherlord Nergel!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10541.ja:
<voice 03335_00010541><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>「……お別れじゃ　<pc>。
　わしのことは　気にせずに　ゆけ！
　そして　必ずや　冥王ネルゲルを倒すのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10541.ko:
<voice 03335_00010541><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>: ……헤어질 때다, <pc>.
　난 신경 쓰지 말고 가거라!
　그리고 반드시 명왕 네르겔을 물리치거라!<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10541.zh-Hans:
<voice 03335_00010541><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……再见了，<pc>。
不必在意我，去吧！
还有，一定要打倒冥王内尔格尔！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10541.zh-Hant:
<voice 03335_00010541><start_lip_sync n00599 _normal m00001>……再見了，<pc>。
不必在意我，去吧！
然後一定要打倒冥王內爾格爾！<stop_lip_animation n00599 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10542.en: <voice 02120_00010542><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It's nice to meet you, <pc> of Ethene.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10542.ja:
<voice 02120_00010542><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「はじめまして。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10542.ko:
<voice 02120_00010542><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 만나서 반가워요.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10542.zh-Hans:
<voice 02120_00010542><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>初次见面，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10542.zh-Hant:
<voice 02120_00010542><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>初次見面，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10543.en:
<voice 02150_00010543><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>I'm certain you already know this, but
my name is <pc>, and
I'm from Tsusukul Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10543.ja:
<voice 02150_00010543><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「名乗るまでもないとは思いますが
　私は　ツスクルの村の
　<pc>といいます。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10543.ko:
<voice 02150_00010543><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 소개하지 않아도 이미 아시겠지만
　전 투스쿠르 마을의
　{pc}|hpp(이라,라)고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10543.zh-Hans:
<voice 02150_00010543><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想应该不用
自我介绍了吧，
我是津洲久留村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10543.zh-Hant:
<voice 02150_00010543><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想應該不用
自我介紹了吧，
我是津洲久留村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10544.en:
<voice 02690_00010544><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>That's correct.
I'm the original owner of that elf
body you've been inhabiting.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10544.ja:
<voice 02690_00010544><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そう。先刻まで　あなたの魂が
　入り込んでいた　エルフの若者の姿……
　その元の持ち主が　私です。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10544.ko:
<voice 02690_00010544><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그래요, 조금 전까지 당신의 영혼이
　머물러 있던 엘프의 몸……
　그 몸의 주인이 바로 접니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10544.zh-Hans:
<voice 02690_00010544><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的埃尔夫族青年的身体……
原本是属于我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10544.zh-Hant:
<voice 02690_00010544><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的艾爾芙族年輕人的形態……
原本是屬於我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10545.en:
<voice 03010_00010545><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Perhaps it's because we share the
same name that your soul and my
body found one another.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10545.ja:
<voice 03010_00010545><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「おそらく　同じ名前であるがゆえに
　あなたの魂と私の姿が　引かれ合い
　あなたは　私の姿に入り込んだのでしょうね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10545.ko:
<voice 03010_00010545><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아마도 이름이 같았던 탓에
　당신의 영혼과 제 몸이 서로를 끌어당겨
　당신이 제 몸으로 들어오게 된 거겠죠.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10545.zh-Hans:
<voice 03010_00010545><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想正是因为我们同名，
你的灵魂才能与我的身体匹配，
并进入到我身体之中的吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10545.zh-Hant:
<voice 03010_00010545><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想正是因為我們同名，
你的靈魂才會和我的形態互相吸引，
並進入到我的形態中吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10546.en:
<voice 03040_00010546><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>No need to worry.
By the time your soul entered
my body, I was already dead.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10546.ja:
<voice 03040_00010546><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「いえ。気に病む必要はありません。
　あなたの魂が　入り込んだとき
　私は　すでに死んでいたのですから。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10546.ko:
<voice 03040_00010546><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아뇨, 미안해하실 필요 없습니다.
　당신의 영혼이 들어왔을 때
　전 이미 죽은 상태였으니까요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10546.zh-Hans:
<voice 03040_00010546><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没事，你不用过意不去。
你的灵魂进入我的身体时，
我已经死去了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10546.zh-Hant:
<voice 03040_00010546><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒關係，你不用覺得過意不去。
你的靈魂進入我的身體時，
我已經死去了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10547.en:
<voice 03070_00010547><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Please continue to use my
body, if you'd like.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10547.ja:
<voice 03070_00010547><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あなたさえよければ　今後も　私の姿を
　お使いください。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10547.ko:
<voice 03070_00010547><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 당신만 괜찮다면 앞으로도
　제 몸을 써 주시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10547.zh-Hans:
<voice 03070_00010547><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>今后只要你愿意，
可以随意使用我的形态。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10547.zh-Hant:
<voice 03070_00010547><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>只要你不介意，今後也請繼續
使用我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10548.en:
<voice 03735_00010548><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yes.
Even now that you're a human
again, my form still rests within you.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10548.ja:
<voice 03735_00010548><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ええ。私の姿は　人間に戻った
　あなたの中に　今も　存在しています。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10548.ko:
<voice 03735_00010548><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 네, 제 몸은 인간으로 돌아간
　당신 안에 지금도 존재합니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10548.zh-Hans:
<voice 03735_00010548><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，我的形态依旧存在于
变回人类的你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10548.zh-Hant:
<voice 03735_00010548><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於你身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10549.en:
<voice 03975_00010549><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you go to a church, you should now
be able to change forms between
human and elf.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10549.ja:
<voice 03975_00010549><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「今のあなたは　教会へ行くことで
　人間の姿と　エルフの姿とを　
　自由に変えることが　できるはずです。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10549.ko:
<voice 03975_00010549><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 지금의 당신이라면 교회에 가
　인간의 몸과 엘프의 몸을
　자유로이 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10549.zh-Hans:
<voice 03975_00010549><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>今后，你只要去教会
就可以在人类与埃尔夫的
形态之间自由变换了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10549.zh-Hant:
<voice 03975_00010549><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>今後，你只要去教會
就可以在人類與艾爾芙的
形態之間自由變換了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10550.en:
<voice 04005_00010550><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>This must be the divine gift you
were given to ultimately defeat
the Netherlord Nergel.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10550.ja:
<voice 04005_00010550><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これはきっと　冥王ネルゲルを倒すという
　使命を果たすため　神が　あなたに
　授けてくださった　能力なのでしょう。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10550.ko:
<voice 04005_00010550><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아마도 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　당신의 사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　신이 당신에게 내려준 능력이겠죠.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10550.zh-Hans:
<voice 04005_00010550><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>神将这种能力赐予你，
一定是为了帮助你完成使命，
打倒冥王内尔格尔吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10550.zh-Hant:
<voice 04005_00010550><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>神將這種能力賜予你，
一定是為了幫助你完成使命，
打倒冥王內爾格爾吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10572.en:
<voice 02120_00010572><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It's nice to meet you... I think?
<pc> of Ethene.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10572.ja:
<voice 02120_00010572><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「はじめまして……でよいのかしら？
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10572.ko:
<voice 02120_00010572><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 만나서 반가워요……라고 하면 될까요?
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10572.zh-Hans:
<voice 02120_00010572><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>应该算是……初次见面吧？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10572.zh-Hant:
<voice 02120_00010572><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>應該算是……初次見面吧？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10573.en:
<voice 02150_00010573><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>As you probably already know, my
name is <pc>, and I'm from
Tsusukul Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10573.ja:
<voice 02150_00010573><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「すでに　ご承知のこととは思いますが
　わたくしは　ツスクルの村の
　<pc>と申します。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10573.ko:
<voice 02150_00010573><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이미 알고 있겠지만
　전 투스쿠르 마을의
　{pc}|hpp(이라,라)고 해요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10573.zh-Hans:
<voice 02150_00010573><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想你应该
认识我吧，
我是津洲久留村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10573.zh-Hant:
<voice 02150_00010573><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想你應該是
知道的吧，
我是津洲久留村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10574.en:
<voice 02690_00010574><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>That's correct.
The female elf body that you've
been using is my original body.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10574.ja:
<voice 02690_00010574><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そう。先刻まで　あなたの魂が
　入り込んでいた　エルフの娘の姿……
　その元の持ち主が　わたくしなのです。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10574.ko:
<voice 02690_00010574><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 맞아요, 조금 전까지 당신의 영혼이
　머물러 있던 엘프의 몸……
　그 몸의 주인이 바로 저랍니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10574.zh-Hans:
<voice 02690_00010574><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的埃尔夫姑娘的身体……
原本是属于我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10574.zh-Hant:
<voice 02690_00010574><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的艾爾芙族女子的形態……
原本是屬於我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10575.en:
Isn't it so strange, though? I can't believe the soul of someone who shares my name was able
to inhabit my body...
10575.ja:
<voice 03010_00010575><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それにしても　不思議なものですわね。
　たまたま　同じ名前の方の魂が　
　わたくしの姿に　入ってしまうなんて……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10575.ko:
<voice 03010_00010575><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그런데 정말 신기하네요.
　우연히 같은 이름을 가진 분의 영혼이
　제 몸에 들어오다니 말이에요…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10575.zh-Hans:
<voice 03010_00010575><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>真是不可思议啊，
没想到会偶然被一个
同名者的灵魂附身……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10575.zh-Hant:
<voice 03010_00010575><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>真是不可思議啊，
沒想到會偶然被一個
同名者的靈魂附身……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10576.en:
<voice 03040_00010576><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>No, don't worry about that.
I was already dead when your
spirit found its way to me.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10576.ja:
<voice 03040_00010576><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「いえ。そのことは　気にしていませんわ。
　あなたの魂が　入り込んだとき
　わたくしの命は　すでに　絶えてましたもの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10576.ko:
<voice 03040_00010576><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아뇨, 그 점은 신경 안 써요.
　당신의 영혼이 제 몸에 들어왔을 때
　전 이미 숨을 거둔 상태였으니까요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10576.zh-Hans:
<voice 03040_00010576><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不，我没有责怪你的意思。
因为被你的灵魂附身时，
我的生命已经走到了尽头。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10576.zh-Hant:
<voice 03040_00010576><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不，我並沒有特別在意。
畢竟被你的靈魂附身時，
我的生命早已走到了盡頭。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10577.en:
<voice 03070_00010577><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>What I mean is, if you want to
continue using my body, please
feel free.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10577.ja:
<voice 03070_00010577><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そういうわけですから　あなたさえよければ
　今後も　わたくしの姿をお使いください。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10577.ko:
<voice 03070_00010577><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그러니 당신만 괜찮다면
　앞으로도 제 몸을 사용해 주세요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10577.zh-Hans:
<voice 03070_00010577><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以今后只要你愿意，
可以随意使用我的形态。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10577.zh-Hant:
<voice 03070_00010577><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以今後只要你願意，
可以隨意使用我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10578.en:
<voice 03735_00010578><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yes. Even now that you're a human
again, my form still rests within you.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10578.ja:
<voice 03735_00010578><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ええ。わたくしの姿は　人間に戻った
　あなたの中に　今も　存在しています。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10578.ko:
<voice 03735_00010578><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 네, 제 몸은 인간으로 돌아간
　당신 안에 지금도 존재해요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10578.zh-Hans:
<voice 03735_00010578><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，我的形态依旧存在于
变回人类的你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10578.zh-Hant:
<voice 03735_00010578><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，你雖然變回了人類
但我的形態依然存在於你身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10579.en:
<voice 03975_00010579><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>From now on, you should be able to
change between your elf and human
forms at any church as you like.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10579.ja:
<voice 03975_00010579><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これからは　教会へ行くことで
　人間の姿と　エルフの姿とを　
　自由に変えることが　できるはずですわ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10579.ko:
<voice 03975_00010579><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 앞으로는 교회에 가면
　인간의 몸과 엘프의 몸을
　자유로이 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10579.zh-Hans:
<voice 03975_00010579><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>今后，你只要去教会
就可以在人类与埃尔夫的
形态之间自由变换了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10579.zh-Hant:
<voice 03975_00010579><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>今後你只要去教會
就可以在人類與艾爾芙的
形態之間自由變換了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10580.en:
<voice 04005_00010580><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>This must be a divine ability given
to you in order to fulfill your duty
of defeating the Netherlord Nergel.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10580.ja:
<voice 04005_00010580><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これはきっと　冥王ネルゲルを倒すという
　使命を果たすため　神が　あなたに
　授けてくださった能力なのでしょう。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10580.ko:
<voice 04005_00010580><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아마도 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　당신의 사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　신이 당신에게 내려준 능력이겠죠.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10580.zh-Hans:
<voice 04005_00010580><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>神将这种能力赐予你，
一定是为了帮助你完成使命，
打倒冥王内尔格尔吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10580.zh-Hant:
<voice 04005_00010580><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>神將這種能力賜予你，
一定是為了幫助你完成使命，
打倒冥王內爾格爾吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10724.en:
<voice 02240_00010724><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Nice to meetcha... I think?
Anyways, it's nice to finally talk to
you, <pc> of Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10724.ja:
<voice 02240_00010724><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「はじめまして……でいいのかな？
　とにかく　話せて　うれしいよ
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10724.ko:
<voice 02240_00010724><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 만나서 반가워……라고 하면 되려나?
　아무튼 이렇게 얘기할 수 있어서 기뻐.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10724.zh-Hans:
<voice 02240_00010724><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>应该算是……初次见面吧？
见到你很高兴，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10724.zh-Hant:
<voice 02240_00010724><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>應該算是……初次見面吧？
很高興能夠和你說上話，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10725.en:
<voice 02270_00010725><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>My name's <pc>,
I'm from Leen.
...ah, but you already knew that.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10725.ja:
<voice 02270_00010725><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「僕は　レーンの村の　<pc>。
　……って　そんなこと　とっくに
　わかってるよな。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10725.ko:
<voice 02270_00010725><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 난 렌 마을의 <pc>.
　……아, 이런 건
　이미 다 알고 있겠네.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10725.zh-Hans:
<voice 02270_00010725><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是雷恩村的<pc>。
……这件事
不说你也知道吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10725.zh-Hant:
<voice 02270_00010725><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是雷恩村的<pc>。
……我想你應該
早就知道了吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10726.en:
<voice 02760_00010726><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yup, that's right.
I'm the original owner of that body
you were using not too long ago.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10726.ja:
<voice 02760_00010726><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そう。さっきまで　君の魂が
　入ってた　ウェディの若者……
　あの姿の　元の持ち主ってことさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10726.ko:
<voice 02760_00010726><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 맞아, 조금 전까지
　네 영혼이 머물러 있던 웨디의 몸……
　그 몸의 원래 주인이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10726.zh-Hans:
<voice 02760_00010726><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的维迪族青年的身体……
原本是属于我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10726.zh-Hant:
<voice 02760_00010726><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的維迪族年輕人的形態……
原本是屬於我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10727.en:
Pretty weird, don'tcha think? How can another person's soul enter someone else's body who just
so happens to have the same name?
10727.ja:
<voice 03130_00010727><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「まったく　奇妙な話だよなぁ。
　同じ名前だからって　別人の魂が
　僕の姿に入って　動かすなんてさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10727.ko:
<voice 03130_00010727><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 참 신기한 일도 다 있다니까.
　이름이 같다는 이유로 다른 사람의 영혼이
　내 몸에 들어와서 날 조종하다니 말이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10727.zh-Hans:
<voice 03130_00010727><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不过这真是太奇妙了。
就算名字一样，但另一个人的灵魂
居然能进入和使用我的身体。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10727.zh-Hant:
<voice 03130_00010727><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不過這真是太奇妙了。
就算名字一樣，但另一個人的靈魂
居然能進入並使用我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10728.en:
<voice 03160_00010728><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Ah, whatever.
I was already dead when that
happened, so nothin' to worry about.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10728.ja:
<voice 03160_00010728><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あっ！　別に　いいんだよ。
　あのとき　僕は　もう死んでたんだから
　何も　気に病むことはないさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10728.ko:
<voice 03160_00010728><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아! 딱히 마음 쓸 필요 없어.
　그때 난 이미 죽었으니
　네가 미안해할 일은 아니지.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10728.zh-Hans:
<voice 03160_00010728><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊！没关系。
反正那时候我已经死掉了，
你不用自责。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10728.zh-Hant:
<voice 03160_00010728><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊！沒關係啦。
反正那時候我已經死掉了，
你不用自責。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10729.en:
<voice 03190_00010729><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yup. If you want, feel free to keep
using my amazing looks.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10729.ja:
<voice 03190_00010729><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「うん。君さえよければ　これからも
　僕の姿を　使ってくれていいんだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10729.ko:
<voice 03190_00010729><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 응, 너만 괜찮다면
　앞으로도 내 몸을 써 줘.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10729.zh-Hans:
<voice 03190_00010729><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，今后要是你愿意，
可以继续使用我的形态。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10729.zh-Hant:
<voice 03190_00010729><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，今後要是你願意，
可以繼續使用我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10730.en:
<voice 03785_00010730><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Looks like I still exist as a
part of you even though you
changed back into a human.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10730.ja:
<voice 03785_00010730><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「じつはね　僕の姿なんだけど
　人間の姿に戻った　君の中に
　今も　ちゃんと　存在してるみたいなんだ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10730.ko:
<voice 03785_00010730><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 실은 내 몸 말인데
　인간의 몸으로 돌아간 네 안에
　지금도 멀쩡히 존재하는 것 같아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10730.zh-Hans:
<voice 03785_00010730><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>其实我的形态
依然存在于
变回人类的你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10730.zh-Hant:
<voice 03785_00010730><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>其實，雖然你變回了人類，
但我的形態似乎依然存在於
你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10731.en:
Why not try it out? If you go to a church, you should be able to switch between human
and Weddie at will.
10731.ja:
<voice 04055_00010731><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「試しに　教会へ行ってみるといいよ。
　今の君は　人間の身体と　ウェディの身体を
　自由に選んで　使うことができるはずさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10731.ko:
<voice 04055_00010731><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 시험 삼아 교회에 가 봐.
　지금의 너라면 인간의 몸과 웨디의 몸을
　자유롭게 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10731.zh-Hans:
<voice 04055_00010731><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>你去教会试试看就明白了。
你应该已经可以在
人类与维迪的身体之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10731.zh-Hant:
<voice 04055_00010731><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>你就試著去教會看看吧。
現在應該已經可以在
人類與維迪的身體之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10732.en:
<voice 04085_00010732><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>It's no doubt you have this
ability just so you can beat that
Nergel creep's ass!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10732.ja:
<voice 04085_00010732><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これは　きっと　冥王ネルゲルを
　倒すという使命のため
　君に宿った能力に　ちがいないよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10732.ko:
<voice 04085_00010732><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　네 사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　네게 주어진 능력인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10732.zh-Hans:
<voice 04085_00010732><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是为了让你完成
打倒冥王内尔格尔的使命，
这个能力才选择了你。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10732.zh-Hant:
<voice 04085_00010732><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這個能力肯定是為了讓你完成
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命，
才會寄宿在你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10754.en:
<voice 02240_00010754><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Hi! How are you?
<pc> of Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10754.ja:
<voice 02240_00010754><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ハーイ！　ごきげんいかが？
　エテーネの村の　<pc>さん。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10754.ko:
<voice 02240_00010754><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 안녕! 잘 지냈어?
　에테네 마을의 <pc> 씨.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10754.zh-Hans:
<voice 02240_00010754><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗨！你好么？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10754.zh-Hant:
<voice 02240_00010754><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗨！你好嗎？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10755.en:
<voice 02270_00010755><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>The name's <pc> from Leen
Village. ...buuuuut I don't have to
introduce myself.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10755.ja:
<voice 02270_00010755><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「私は　レーンの村の　<pc>。
　……なーんて　自己紹介するまでもないよね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10755.ko:
<voice 02270_00010755><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 난 렌 마을의 {pc}|hpp(이야,야).
　……뭐, 굳이 소개할 필요도 없겠지만.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10755.zh-Hans:
<voice 02270_00010755><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是雷恩村的<pc>。
……这种自我介绍有点多余啊。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10755.zh-Hant:
<voice 02270_00010755><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是雷恩村的<pc>。
……應該用不著自我介紹吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10756.en:
<voice 02760_00010756><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Mhm. That female Weddie body
that you've been using, I'm the
original owner!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10756.ja:
<voice 02760_00010756><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そうそう。さっきまで　あなたの魂が
　入ってた　ウェディの娘の姿。
　あれの　本来の持ち主が　私ってわけ！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10756.ko:
<voice 02760_00010756><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 맞아, 조금 전까지
　네 영혼이 머물러 있던 웨디의 몸.
　그 몸의 원래 주인이 바로 나야!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10756.zh-Hans:
<voice 02760_00010756><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的维迪姑娘的身体，
原本是属于我的！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10756.zh-Hant:
<voice 02760_00010756><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的維迪女子的形態，
原本是屬於我的！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10757.en:
<voice 03130_00010757><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>So is that why? Is it because
we share the same name that your
soul has taken my body?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10757.ja:
<voice 03130_00010757><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「やっぱり　あれかしらね？
　同じ名前してるから　あなたの魂が
　私の姿に　入り込んじゃったのかしら？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10757.ko:
<voice 03130_00010757><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 역시 그건가?
　이름이 똑같아서 네 영혼이
　내 몸에 들어온 건가?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10757.zh-Hans:
<voice 03130_00010757><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>因为和我起了同样的名字，
你的灵魂才进入了我的身体。
我想我猜的应该没错吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10757.zh-Hant:
<voice 03130_00010757><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想大概是因為
和我起了同樣的名字，
你的靈魂才會進入了我的形態吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10758.en:
<voice 03160_00010758><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Ah, well, don't worry about it. I was
already dead by that point, so there's
nothing I could've done anyway.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10758.ja:
<voice 03160_00010758><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あ　でも　気にすることはないわよ。
　あのときには　私　もう死んでたんだから
　どーしようもなかったし。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10758.ko:
<voice 03160_00010758><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아, 하지만 미안해할 필요 없어.
　그때 난 이미 죽었으니
　달리 무슨 수가 있었겠어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10758.zh-Hans:
<voice 03160_00010758><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊，不过，你不用觉得过意不去。
那时候我的死已经是
无法改变的事实了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10758.zh-Hant:
<voice 03160_00010758><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊，不過，你不用覺得過意不去。
我當時早就已經死了，
這也無可奈何。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10759.en:
<voice 03190_00010759><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Feel free to use my body as long
as you want. My looks are
super sweet and cool. <heart><stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10759.ja:
<voice 03190_00010759><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あなたさえよければ　これからも
　私の姿を　使ってくれていいんだよ。
　私のルックスって　超イケてるしね<heart><stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10759.ko:
<voice 03190_00010759><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 너만 좋다면
　앞으로도 내 몸을 써도 괜찮아.
　내가 또 한 미모 하잖아<heart><stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10759.zh-Hans:
<voice 03190_00010759><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>只要你愿意，
今后可以继续使用我的形态。
我长得可是标致得很呢<heart><stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10759.zh-Hant:
<voice 03190_00010759><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>只要你願意，
今後可以繼續使用我的形態。
我長得可是標緻得很呢<heart><stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10760.en:
<voice 03785_00010760><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Oh, didn't you notice?
That's my soul, but it still exists
inside you even as a human.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10760.ja:
<voice 03785_00010760><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……あ　気づいてない？
　私の姿だけど　人間の姿に戻った
　あなたの中に今も　存在してるの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10760.ko:
<voice 03785_00010760><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아, 눈치 못 챘어?
　내 몸 말인데, 인간의 몸으로 돌아간
　네 안에 지금도 잘 있어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10760.zh-Hans:
<voice 03785_00010760><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……你还没注意到么？
我的形态依然存在于
已经变回人类的你身上哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10760.zh-Hant:
<voice 03785_00010760><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……啊，你還沒注意到嗎？
你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於你的身上喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10761.en:
Yep, that's right. You should head to a church when ya can. Then you can use
either my form or your human one, whichever you like.
10761.ja:
<voice 04055_00010761><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そうね。教会へ　行ってみるといいわ。
　そうすれば　人間の姿と　私の姿
　好きなほうを　使えるようになるはずよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10761.ko:
<voice 04055_00010761><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그렇지, 교회에 한번 가 봐.
　그럼 인간의 몸과 내 몸을
　마음대로 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10761.zh-Hans:
<voice 04055_00010761><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>对了，你去教会试试看就明白了。
应该已经能够在
人类和我的外表之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10761.zh-Hant:
<voice 04055_00010761><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想想，你就去教會看看好了。
這麼一來，應該就能在
人類和我的形態之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10762.en:
<voice 04085_00010762><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>This has to be a special ability you got
so you could beat that Nergel guy!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10762.ja:
<voice 04085_00010762><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これって　きっと　冥王ネルゲルを
　倒す使命を背負った　あなたに与えられた
　特別な能力に　ちがいないわ！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10762.ko:
<voice 04085_00010762><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　중대한 사명을 짊어진
　네게 주어진 특별한 능력이 분명해!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10762.zh-Hans:
<voice 04085_00010762><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>这肯定是上天为了让你完成
打倒冥王内尔格尔的使命，
而赋予你的特殊能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10762.zh-Hant:
<voice 04085_00010762><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這肯定是上天為了讓你完成
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命，
而賦予你的特殊能力！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10664.en:
<voice 02360_00010664><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Hey! Finally, we meet.
<pc> of Ethene Village!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10664.ja:
<voice 02360_00010664><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「よう！　ようやく　会えたな。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10664.ko:
<voice 02360_00010664><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이봐! 드디어 만났군.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10664.zh-Hans:
<voice 02360_00010664><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>哟！终于见面了，
伊甸村的<pc>！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10664.zh-Hant:
<voice 02360_00010664><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>喲！終於見面了，
伊甸村的<pc>！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10665.en:
<voice 02390_00010665><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>I know I probably don't need to say
this, but I'm <pc> from Rangao
Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10665.ja:
<voice 02390_00010665><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「とっくに　知ってると思うが
　オレは　ランガーオ村の　<pc>だ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10665.ko:
<voice 02390_00010665><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이미 알고 있겠지만
　난 랑가오 마을의 {pc}|hpp(이다,다).<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10665.zh-Hans:
<voice 02390_00010665><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不说你也知道吧，
我是兰加奥村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10665.zh-Hant:
<voice 02390_00010665><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想你應該早就知道了，
我是蘭加奧村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10666.en:
<voice 02830_00010666><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yes, that's right. The ogre that
your soul was in just a moment ago...
I am the true owner of that body.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10666.ja:
<voice 02830_00010666><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ああ　そうだ。さっきまで　あんたの魂が
　入ってた　オーガの姿……
　オレは　あの肉体の　真の持ち主さ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10666.ko:
<voice 02830_00010666><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그래, 맞아. 조금 전까지
　네 영혼이 머물러 있던 오거의 몸……
　난 그 몸의 원래 주인이다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10666.zh-Hans:
<voice 02830_00010666><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的奥伽青年的身体……
原本是属于我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10666.zh-Hant:
<voice 02830_00010666><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的奧伽形態……
那個肉體原本的主人就是我。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10667.en:
It's pretty strange, isn't it? Is that how reviving someone works? It's hard to believe someone
with my name took my body.
10667.ja:
<voice 03250_00010667><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「まったく　不思議なもんだよな。
　生き返しってのは　そういうルールなのか？
　同じ名前のヤツの魂が　入り込むなんてよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10667.ko:
<voice 03250_00010667><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 나 원, 신기한 우연도 다 있다니까.
　부활에는 그런 규칙이라도 있는 건가?
　같은 이름을 가진 영혼이 들어오다니 말이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10667.zh-Hans:
<voice 03250_00010667><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>真是难以置信。
进入我身体的竟是和我同名的家伙。
难道这就是死而复生的规则？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10667.zh-Hant:
<voice 03250_00010667><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>真的是很不可思議吧。
難道復活還有這種規則嗎？
居然是由同名的人進入我的身體。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10668.en:
<voice 03280_00010668><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>No, don't worry about that.
I'm actually pretty glad you get to
keep using that body of mine.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10668.ja:
<voice 03280_00010668><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「いや　別に気にしなくていいんだぜ。
　むしろ　オレの肉体を　きたえてくれた
　あんたには　感謝してるっつーか……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10668.ko:
<voice 03280_00010668><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아니, 딱히 미안해할 필요는 없어.
　오히려 내 몸을 단련시켜 준
　네게 고맙기도 하달까…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10668.zh-Hans:
<voice 03280_00010668><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不，我没有怪你的意思。
你把我的身体锻炼得那么结实，
我还有些感谢你呢……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10668.zh-Hant:
<voice 03280_00010668><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>哎呀，你不用在意。
該說你一路鍛鍊我的肉體至今，
我反而很感謝你呢……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10669.en:
<voice 03310_00010669><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Well, as long as it's fine with you,
you can keep using it. I hope you
can keep it in shape for me.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10669.ja:
<voice 03310_00010669><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「まあ　そういうわけだからよ。
　あんたさえよけりゃ　今後も
　オレの姿を　使ってくれていいんだぜ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10669.ko:
<voice 03310_00010669><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 아무튼 그러니까
　너만 괜찮다면 앞으로도
　내 몸을 계속 써 줘.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10669.zh-Hans:
<voice 03310_00010669><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以呢，只要你不嫌弃，
今后依然可以
继续使用我的身体。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10669.zh-Hant:
<voice 03310_00010669><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以呢，只要你不嫌棄，
今後依然可以
繼續使用我的身體。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10670.en:
<voice 03835_00010670><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...yeah, that's me. I'm still there
inside you, even in your small
human shape.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10670.ja:
<voice 03835_00010670><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……ああ　オレの姿だけどよ。
　人間の姿に戻った　あんたの中に
　今も　ちゃーんと　存在してるんだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10670.ko:
<voice 03835_00010670><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아, 내 몸 말인데
　인간의 몸으로 돌아간 네 안에
　지금도 잘 있어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10670.zh-Hans:
<voice 03835_00010670><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>对了，我的形态
依然存在于
变回人类的你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10670.zh-Hant:
<voice 03835_00010670><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……對了，你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於
你的身上喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10671.en:
<voice 04135_00010671><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Don't believe me, huh?
Well, if you go to a church, you
can switch between our bodies.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10671.ja:
<voice 04135_00010671><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ウソだと思うなら　教会へ行ってみな。
　そうすりゃ　人間の姿と　オレの姿
　好きなときに　好きなほうを　使えるはずさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10671.ko:
<voice 04135_00010671><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 못 믿겠으면 교회에 가 봐.
　그럼 인간의 몸과 내 몸을
　마음대로 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10671.zh-Hans:
<voice 04135_00010671><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的话你就到教会去看看。
应该已经能够在
人类和我的形态之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10671.zh-Hant:
<voice 04135_00010671><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的話，你就到教會去看看。
應該已經能夠在
人類和我的形態之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10672.en:
<voice 04165_00010672><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Seems like you've gotten this ability
so that you might beat that
bastard Nergel.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10672.ja:
<voice 04165_00010672><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「こりゃあきっと　冥王ネルゲルを倒すって
　使命のため　あんたに　宿った能力に
　ちがいないだろうよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10672.ko:
<voice 04165_00010672><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　네게 주어진 능력인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10672.zh-Hans:
<voice 04165_00010672><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是因为你肩负着
打倒冥王内尔格尔的使命，
所以才能得到这个能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10672.zh-Hant:
<voice 04165_00010672><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是因為你肩負著
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命，
所以才能得到這個能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10694.en:
<voice 02360_00010694><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Finally, the time's come when we can talk like this,
y'know. I'm glad, <pc> of Ethene Village.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10694.ja:
<voice 02360_00010694><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「やっと　こうして　話せるときが来たんだね。
　うれしいよ。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10694.ko:
<voice 02360_00010694><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 드디어 이렇게 얘기해 보네.
　정말 기뻐.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10694.zh-Hans:
<voice 02360_00010694><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>终于能这样面对面交谈了，
真是太好了，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10694.zh-Hant:
<voice 02360_00010694><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>終於能這樣面對面交談了，
真是太好了，
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10695.en:
<voice 02390_00010695><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>I'm <pc> from Rangao Village... But
you knew that already, right?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10695.ja:
<voice 02390_00010695><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「アタシは　ランガーオ村の　<pc>。
　……って　とーぜん　知ってるわね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10695.ko:
<voice 02390_00010695><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 난 랑가오 마을의 {pc}|hpp(이야,야).
　……뭐, 당연히 알고 있겠지만.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10695.zh-Hans:
<voice 02390_00010695><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是兰加奥村的<pc>。
……不过不说你也知道了吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10695.zh-Hant:
<voice 02390_00010695><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是蘭加奧村的<pc>。
……我想你應該是知道的吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10696.en:
<voice 02830_00010696><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>That's right. The female ogre's body that your soul,
until recently, had been contained within. I'm its
original owner.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10696.ja:
<voice 02830_00010696><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そう。さっきまで　あんたの魂が入ってた
　オーガ娘の姿。
　アタシは　あれの元の持ち主ってわけ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10696.ko:
<voice 02830_00010696><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 맞아, 조금 전까지
　네 영혼이 머물러 있던 오거의 몸.
　내가 바로 그 몸의 원래 주인이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10696.zh-Hans:
<voice 02830_00010696><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的奥伽族姑娘的身体，
原本是属于我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10696.zh-Hant:
<voice 02830_00010696><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的奧伽族女子的形態，
原本是屬於我的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10697.en:
<voice 03250_00010697><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Pretty strange to say, isn't it? And what are the
chances that a human with the same name as me would
use my body.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10697.ja:
<voice 03250_00010697><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「しかし　変な話だよね。
　たまたま　アタシと　名前が同じ人間が
　アタシの姿を　使うことになるなんてさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10697.ko:
<voice 03250_00010697><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그나저나 참 신기한 일도 다 있어.
　우연히 나와 같은 이름을 가진 인간이
　내 몸을 쓰게 되다니 말이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10697.zh-Hans:
<voice 03250_00010697><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不过真是件怪事。
和我有同样名字的人
碰巧使用了我的形态。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10697.zh-Hant:
<voice 03250_00010697><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不過真是件怪事。
和我有同樣名字的人
碰巧使用了我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10698.en:
<voice 03280_00010698><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Huh? It's nothing to worry about. Actually, I want
to thank you for helping hone my poor body.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10698.ja:
<voice 03280_00010698><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……ん？　別に　気にすることないって。
　むしろ　貧弱だった　アタシの身体を
　きたえてくれて　感謝したいくらいだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10698.ko:
<voice 03280_00010698><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……응? 딱히 미안해할 필요 없어.
　오히려 나약했던 내 몸을
　단련시켜 줘서 고마울 정도야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10698.zh-Hans:
<voice 03280_00010698><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……嗯？你不用过意不去啦。
能把我瘦弱的身体锻炼得这么标致，
我还想谢谢你呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10698.zh-Hant:
<voice 03280_00010698><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……嗯？你不用過意不去啦。
能把我瘦弱的身體鍛鍊得這麼標緻，
我還想謝謝你呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10699.en:
<voice 03310_00010699><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>That said, if you want, you can keep using my body as
you like.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10699.ja:
<voice 03310_00010699><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そういうワケだからさ。
　あんたさえよけりゃ　今後も　アタシの姿を
　自由に　使ってくれていいんだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10699.ko:
<voice 03310_00010699><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그러니까
　너만 괜찮다면 앞으로도 내 몸을
　자유롭게 사용해도 괜찮아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10699.zh-Hans:
<voice 03310_00010699><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以呢，只要你愿意，
今后依然可以
自由使用我的身体。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10699.zh-Hant:
<voice 03310_00010699><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>所以呢，只要你願意，
今後依然可以
自由使用我的身體。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10700.en:
<voice 03835_00010700><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Haven't you noticed? My form still exists within you,
even as a human.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10700.ja:
<voice 03835_00010700><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「気づいてなかったかい？　アタシの姿は
　人間の姿に戻った　あんたの中に
　今も　ちゃんと　存在してるんだ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10700.ko:
<voice 03835_00010700><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 눈치 못 챘어? 내 몸은
　인간의 몸으로 돌아간 네 안에
　지금도 잘 있어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10700.zh-Hans:
<voice 03835_00010700><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>你还没注意到么？
我的形态依然存在于
变回人类的你的身上哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10700.zh-Hant:
<voice 03835_00010700><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>你還沒注意到嗎？
你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於你身上喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10701.en:
<voice 04135_00010701><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you think I'm lying, try going to a church. Once
you're there, you can change between your human body
and mine anytime you like.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10701.ja:
<voice 04135_00010701><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ウソだと思うなら　教会へ行ってごらんよ。
　そうすりゃ　人間の姿と　アタシの姿
　好きなときに　好きなほうを　使えるはずさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10701.ko:
<voice 04135_00010701><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 못 믿겠으면 교회에 가 봐.
　그럼 인간의 몸과 내 몸을
　마음대로 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10701.zh-Hans:
<voice 04135_00010701><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的话你就到教会去看看。
应该已经能够在
人类和我的形态之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10701.zh-Hant:
<voice 04135_00010701><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信你就到教會去看看。
應該已經能夠在
人類和我的形態之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10702.en:
<voice 04165_00010702><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>You must've gotten this ability so that you could
eventually beat Netherlord Nergel.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10702.ja:
<voice 04165_00010702><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これは　きっと　冥王ネルゲルを
　倒すって　使命のために
　あんたに宿った能力に　ちがいないよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10702.ko:
<voice 04165_00010702><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　네게 주어진 능력인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10702.zh-Hans:
<voice 04165_00010702><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是因为你肩负着
打倒冥王内尔格尔的使命，
所以才能得到这个能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10702.zh-Hant:
<voice 04165_00010702><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是因為你肩負著
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命，
所以才能得到這個能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10784.en:
<voice 02470_00010784><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Hey, hey! It's great to finally meet you,
<pc> of Ethene Village.
So glad we can finally chat like this.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10784.ja:
<voice 02470_00010784><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「やあ　やあ！　やっと　会えたね。
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。
　こうして話せるなんて　うれしーよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10784.ko:
<voice 02470_00010784><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 안녕! 드디어 만났네.
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.
　이렇게 얘기할 수 있어서 정말 기뻐.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10784.zh-Hans:
<voice 02470_00010784><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>呀、呀！总算见面了，
伊甸村的<pc>，
能与你面对面地说话，我真是太高兴了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10784.zh-Hant:
<voice 02470_00010784><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>呀、呀！總算見面了，
伊甸村的<pc>，
能與你面對面地說話，我真是太高興了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10785.en:
<voice 02500_00010785><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>The name's <pc> from Pukulet.
...but ya knew that, right? Of course
you did, I'm a bit of a celebrity.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10785.ja:
<voice 02500_00010785><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ボクは　プクレット村の　<pc>。
　……なーんて　知ってるよね？
　ボクって　ちょっとした　有名人だからさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10785.ko:
<voice 02500_00010785><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 난 푸크레트 마을의 {pc}|hpp(이야,야).
　……뭐, 이미 다 알지?
　내가 은근히 유명인이잖아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10785.zh-Hans:
<voice 02500_00010785><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是普库莱特村的<pc>。
……其实不说，你也认识我吧？
毕竟我还是有点名气的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10785.zh-Hant:
<voice 02500_00010785><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我是普庫萊特村的<pc>。
……其實不說，你也認識我吧？
畢竟我還是有點名氣的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10786.en:
Pretty unfortunate that we were born with the same name as me, eh? You'd have a hard time, bein'
compared to me and all.
10786.ja:
<voice 02885_00010786><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そんなボクと　同名に生まれちゃうなんて
　キミにとっては　不幸だったかもね。
　だって　絶対くらべられちゃうもの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10786.ko:
<voice 02885_00010786><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그런 나와 같은 이름으로 태어나다니
　너한테는 불행일 수도 있겠네.
　왜냐하면 무조건 비교당할 것 아냐.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10786.zh-Hans:
<voice 02885_00010786><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>和我这样的人同名，
对你来说或许是一种不幸吧。
你肯定会被拿来跟我比较的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10786.zh-Hant:
<voice 02885_00010786><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>和我這樣的人同名，
對你來說或許是一種不幸吧。
你肯定會被拿來跟我比較的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10787.en:
<voice 03370_00010787><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>But hey!
It allowed me to become what I am
now. That's not so bad, don't ya think?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10787.ja:
<voice 03370_00010787><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「でも　そのおかげで　このボクの姿に
　なれたんだから　トータルで考えれば
　まあ　悪くなかったんじゃないの？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10787.ko:
<voice 03370_00010787><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 덕분에
　내 몸에 들어올 수 있었으니
　종합적으로 따져 보면 잘된 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10787.zh-Hans:
<voice 03370_00010787><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不过正因为和我重名，
你才能附身到我身上，
总的来说也不算是件坏事吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10787.zh-Hant:
<voice 03370_00010787><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不過也正因為和我同名，
你才能附身到我身上，
就整體來說也不算是件壞事吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10788.en:
<voice 03400_00010788><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>No, no, it's nothing to cry over.
What an experience to be taken
over by someone else, though!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10788.ja:
<voice 03400_00010788><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「いやいや。気にすることはないんだよ。
　他人に姿を　乗っ取られるなんて体験
　なかなか　できるもんじゃないしね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10788.ko:
<voice 03400_00010788><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 에이, 나한테 미안해할 필요 없어.
　남한테 몸을 빼앗기다니
　언제 또 이런 신기한 경험을 하겠어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10788.zh-Hans:
<voice 03400_00010788><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没事没事，你不用觉得过意不去。
被他人附身这种经历，
也是种相当难得的体验呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10788.zh-Hant:
<voice 03400_00010788><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒事沒事，你不用覺得過意不去。
被他人附身這種經歷，
也是種相當難得的體驗呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10789.en:
I'm doin' all this to hone my craft of comedy. If it's inspiring, why wouldn't I want it? But, since
I'm dead, it doesn't really matter.
10789.ja:
<voice 03430_00010789><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これも　笑いの道を極めるため。
　芸のこやしになるなら　望むところってもんさ！
　……もう　死んでるけど。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10789.ko:
<voice 03430_00010789><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이것도 다 개그의 길을 마스터하기 위한 거지.
　개그의 밑거름이 된다면 바라는 바야!
　……이미 죽었지만.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10789.zh-Hans:
<voice 03430_00010789><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>这也是为了攀登搞笑艺术的高峰。
如果这能成为我搞笑的材料，我死而无憾！
……当然我已经死了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10789.zh-Hant:
<voice 03430_00010789><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這也是為了攀登搞笑藝術的高峰。
如果這能成為我搞笑的材料，我死而無憾！
……雖然我已經死了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10790.en: <voice 03460_00010790><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Pfft...! So you think that's funny, huh?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10790.ja:
<voice 03460_00010790><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……プフッ！
　キミも　今　面白いと思ったでしょ？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10790.ko:
<voice 03460_00010790><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……푸흡!
　너도 방금 웃긴다고 생각했지?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10790.zh-Hans:
<voice 03460_00010790><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……噗！
是不是把你也逗笑了？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10790.zh-Hant:
<voice 03460_00010790><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……噗！
你也覺得剛才說的很好笑吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10791.en:
<voice 03520_00010791><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Well, I've got an open mind.
If you really want, you can keep
using my looks.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10791.ja:
<voice 03520_00010791><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「まあ　ボクは　心が広いからね。
　今後も　ボクの姿を　使うこと
　許してあげるよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10791.ko:
<voice 03520_00010791><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 난 마음이 넓으니까.
　앞으로도 내 몸을 써도 좋아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10791.zh-Hans:
<voice 03520_00010791><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>算了，本大人心胸宽广，
允许你今后
继续使用我的形象。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10791.zh-Hant:
<voice 03520_00010791><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>算了，本大人心胸寬廣，
允許你今後
繼續使用我的形態。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10792.en:
<voice 03885_00010792><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...huh? Didn't you notice? Even
thought you're back in your human
form, my form's still inside of you.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10792.ja:
<voice 03885_00010792><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……あり？　気づいてない？
　ボクの姿だけど　人間に戻った
　キミの中に　今も　ちゃんとあるんだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10792.ko:
<voice 03885_00010792><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……어라? 몰랐어?
　내 몸은 인간으로 돌아간
　네 안에 지금도 잘 있어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10792.zh-Hans:
<voice 03885_00010792><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……怎么？你还没注意到么？
你虽然变回了人类，
但我的形态依然存在于你的身上哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10792.zh-Hant:
<voice 03885_00010792><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……怎麼？你還沒注意到嗎？
你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於你的身上喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10793.en:
Think I'm yanking your chain? Go to a church! You can use your form, or maybe my form too.
Whatever tickles your fancy.
10793.ja:
<voice 04215_00010793><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ウソだと思うなら　教会へ行ってみなよ。
　たぶん　ボクの姿と　キミの姿

10794.en:
The God of Laughter had to've lent you some of his mojo to defeat Nergel in one of the greatest gags

<voice 04245_00010794><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「これって　冥王ネルゲルを倒すっていう

I'm sooo happy to talk to you like this.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10823.zh-Hant:

10825.zh-Hans:

<voice 03370_00010826><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>But it made me into who I am

I'm doing this to master my craft of comedy. I hoped it'd be good for me, but I guess it backfired since I'm

<voice 03520_00010830><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Well, you've got a big heart. I'll

<voice 02955_00010604><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yup, that's me. I'm the one who's

10604.ja:
<voice 02955_00010604><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「おうさ。さっきまで　あんたの魂が

10605.en:
Feels kinda weird to have someone else's soul inside my body, not to mention the same name... But it's

10605.ja:
<voice 03580_00010605><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「名前が同じモンの魂が　オイラの姿に

10605.ko:

　어쩐지 운명적인 뭔가가 느껴진다니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10605.zh-Hans:
<voice 03580_00010605><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>被一个同名家伙的灵魂附身，

10606.en:

　どーってことねぇさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10606.ko:
<voice 03610_00010606><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아, 나한테 미안해할 필요는 없어.
　어차피 난 그때 이미 죽었으니까
　하나도 신경 안 써.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10606.zh-Hans:
<voice 03610_00010606><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊，你不用太往心里去。
反正那个时候
咱都已经死掉了嘛。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10606.zh-Hant:
<voice 03610_00010606><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊，沒啥好在意的啦。
反正那時候我早就掛了，
無所謂啦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10607.en:
<voice 03640_00010607><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>But, just so you know, I'm clearly
the better man here.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10607.ja:
<voice 03640_00010607><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それに　オイラのほうが
　あきらかに　いい男だもんなぁ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10607.ko:
<voice 03640_00010607><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 게다가 누가 봐도
　내가 훨씬 잘생겼잖냐.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10607.zh-Hans:
<voice 03640_00010607><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>而且，明摆着
咱比你帅多了嘛。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10607.zh-Hant:
<voice 03640_00010607><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>再說我
明顯比你帥多了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10608.en:
<voice 03670_00010608><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>I gotta admit, your life would probably
be much better if you kept usin' my
body.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10608.ja:
<voice 03670_00010608><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あんた　これからも　オイラの姿を
　使ってったほうが　人生明るいと思うぜ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10608.ko:
<voice 03670_00010608><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 너, 앞으로도 내 몸을 쓰는 게
　살기 편할걸?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10608.zh-Hans:
<voice 03670_00010608><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>推荐你今后继续使用咱的外形，
人生之路会一片光明哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10608.zh-Hant:
<voice 03670_00010608><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>建議你今後也繼續用我的形態，
人生會一片光明喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10609.en:
<voice 03935_00010609><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Mhm. Even though you got your
human form back, my form's still
alive and kicking.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10609.ja:
<voice 03935_00010609><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「おう。オイラの姿だけど
　人間に戻った　あんたの中に
　今も　ちゃーんと　存在してるんだ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10609.ko:
<voice 03935_00010609><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아, 내 몸 말인데
　인간으로 돌아간 네 안에
　지금도 잘 있으니 걱정 마.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10609.zh-Hans:
<voice 03935_00010609><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>对了，咱的形态
依然存在于
变回人类的你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10609.zh-Hant:
<voice 03935_00010609><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>對了，你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於
你的身上。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10610.en:
<voice 04295_00010610><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Don't believe me? Go check it out at
a church. Then you can use your
form or my form, whatever you feel like.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10610.ja:
<voice 04295_00010610><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ウソだと思うなら　教会へ行ってみなよ。　
　そうすりゃ　人間の姿と　オイラの姿
　好きなときに　好きなほうを　使えるはずさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10610.ko:
<voice 04295_00010610><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 거짓말 같으면 교회에 가 봐.
　그럼 인간의 몸과 내 몸을
　마음대로 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10610.zh-Hans:
<voice 04295_00010610><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的话你就到教会去看看。
应该已经能够在
人类和咱的形态之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10610.zh-Hant:
<voice 04295_00010610><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的話，你就到教會去看看。
應該已經能夠在
人類和我的形態之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10611.en:
<voice 04325_00010611><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Some kinda higher power must've
given you this ability to defeat that
Nergel guy.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10611.ja:
<voice 04325_00010611><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「こりゃあきっと　冥王ネルゲルを倒すって
　使命のため　あんたに　宿った能力に
　ちげぇねえよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10611.ko:
<voice 04325_00010611><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　네 사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　네게 주어진 능력인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10611.zh-Hans:
<voice 04325_00010611><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是为了让你完成
打倒冥王内尔格尔的使命
才让你得到这个能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10611.zh-Hant:
<voice 04325_00010611><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這肯定是為了讓你完成
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命
才賦予的能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10633.en:
<voice 02590_00010633><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Nice to meet you... I think?
<pc> of Ethene.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10633.ja:
<voice 02590_00010633><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「はじめまして……だわね？
　エテーネの村の　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10633.ko:
<voice 02590_00010633><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 우리 처음 보는 거…… 맞지?
　에테네 마을의 <pc>.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10633.zh-Hans:
<voice 02590_00010633><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>初次见面……没错吧？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10633.zh-Hant:
<voice 02590_00010633><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>初次見面……沒錯吧？
伊甸村的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10634.en:
<voice 02620_00010634><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>You probably already know, but my
name's <pc>. I'm from Agrani.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10634.ja:
<voice 02620_00010634><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「もう　知ってるとは思うけど
　あたしは　アグラニの　<pc>さぁ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10634.ko:
<voice 02620_00010634><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이미 알고 있겠지만
　난 아그라니의 {pc}|hpp(이야,야).<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10634.zh-Hans:
<voice 02620_00010634><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不说你也知道吧，
我是阿古拉尼的<pc>啦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10634.zh-Hant:
<voice 02620_00010634><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>我想你應該已經知道了，
我是阿古拉尼的<pc>。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10635.en:
<voice 02955_00010635><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yup, yup. That body you've been
using for a while now... it's mine.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10635.ja:
<voice 02955_00010635><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そうそう。さっきまで　あんたの魂が
　入ってた　ドワーフの娘の姿……
　あれが　あたしなんだわ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10635.ko:
<voice 02955_00010635><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 맞아, 조금 전까지
　네 영혼이 머물러 있던 드워프의 몸……
　그 몸의 주인이 바로 나야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10635.zh-Hans:
<voice 02955_00010635><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没错，一直以来你的灵魂
所寄宿的多瓦夫姑娘的身体……
那就是我哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10635.zh-Hant:
<voice 02955_00010635><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒錯，一直以來你的靈魂
所寄宿的多瓦夫女子的形態……
那就是我喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10636.en:
Was it some kinda divine intervention that put someone's soul in my body that had the same name
as me? What a headache...
10636.ja:
<voice 03580_00010636><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「神さまも　なんでまた　同じ名前のモンの魂を
　あたしの姿に　入れたりしたんだろね？
　ややこしくって　仕方ないよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10636.ko:
<voice 03580_00010636><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 신은 왜 하필 같은 이름을 가진
　사람의 영혼을 내 몸에 집어넣은 거람?
　괜히 헷갈리기만 하잖아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10636.zh-Hans:
<voice 03580_00010636><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不过神为什么要把一个和我
同名的人的灵魂塞到我的身体里呢？
真是捉摸不透啊。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10636.zh-Hant:
<voice 03580_00010636><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不過神怎麼又把同名者的靈魂
放進我的形態當中呢？
真是複雜得不得了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10637.en:
<voice 03610_00010637><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Oh, don't worry about that!
By the time you entered my body, I
was already long gone.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10637.ja:
<voice 03610_00010637><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あー　気にしなくてもいいってばさ！
　あたし　あのとき　もう死んじゃってたから
　別に　痛くも　なんともなかったし。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10637.ko:
<voice 03610_00010637><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 아, 나한테 미안해할 것 없어!
　난 그때 이미 죽었으니까
　딱히 아프거나 불편하지도 않았거든.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10637.zh-Hans:
<voice 03610_00010637><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊，你不要在意啦！
反正我也死掉了，
给你用也不觉得心痛啦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10637.zh-Hant:
<voice 03610_00010637><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>啊──你不用在意啦！
我那時候早就死掉了，
根本就不痛不癢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10638.en:
<voice 03640_00010638><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Besides... I'm much more charming
than you are, right?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10638.ja:
<voice 03640_00010638><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それに　今の　あんたの姿より
　あたしの姿のほうが　めんこいだろ？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10638.ko:
<voice 03640_00010638><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 게다가 원래 너보다
　내가 더 예쁘게 생겼잖아?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10638.zh-Hans:
<voice 03640_00010638><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>而且比起你现在的样子，
还是我的样子比较可爱吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10638.zh-Hant:
<voice 03640_00010638><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>而且比起你現在的樣子，
還是我的模樣比較可愛吧？<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10639.en:
<voice 03670_00010639><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you want to keep using my
looks, feel free. Lucky you, huh?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10639.ja:
<voice 03670_00010639><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「あんたさえよければ　これからも
　あたしの姿　使ってもらってかまわないよ。
　やー　あんたは　運がいいわ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10639.ko:
<voice 03670_00010639><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 너만 좋다면 앞으로도
　내 몸을 써도 상관없어.
　이야~ 넌 참 운이 좋아.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10639.zh-Hans:
<voice 03670_00010639><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>要是你愿意的话，
今后还可以继续使用我的形态哦。
哎呀，你真是走运啊。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10639.zh-Hant:
<voice 03670_00010639><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>要是你願意的話，
今後還可以繼續使用我的形態喔。
哎呀──你真是走運呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10640.en:
<voice 03935_00010640><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yup, that's right.
My soul still exists inside you,
even though you're human again.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10640.ja:
<voice 03935_00010640><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そうそう。あたしの姿だけど　
　人間の姿に戻った　あんたの中に
　今も　ちゃーんと　あるみたいなんだわ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10640.ko:
<voice 03935_00010640><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 참, 내 몸 말인데
　인간의 몸으로 돌아간 네 안에
　지금도 잘 있는 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10640.zh-Hans:
<voice 03935_00010640><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>对了，我的形态
依然存在于
变回人类的你的身上哦。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10640.zh-Hant:
<voice 03935_00010640><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>對了，你雖然變回了人類，
但我的形態依然存在於
你的身上喔。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04295_00010641><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>What, do you don't believe me? Go

You can swap between bodies there.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04295_00010641><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ウソだと思うんなら　教会へ行ってみな。

　好きなときに　好きなほうを　使えるからさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10641.ko:
<voice 04295_00010641><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 거짓말 같으면 교회에 가 봐.
　그럼 인간의 몸과 내 몸을
　마음대로 바꿔 쓸 수 있을 테니까.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10641.zh-Hans:
<voice 04295_00010641><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信的话你就到教会去看看。
应该已经能够在
人类和我的形态之间随意选择了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10641.zh-Hant:
<voice 04295_00010641><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>不信你就到教會去看看。
應該已經能夠在
人類和我的形態之間隨意選擇了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10642.en:
<voice 04325_00010642><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>I'm sure you got this ability
just so you could beat the snot
out of Nergel.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10642.ja:
<voice 04325_00010642><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「こりゃあきっと　冥王ネルゲルを倒すって
　使命のため　あんたに　宿った能力に
　ちげぇねえだよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10642.ko:
<voice 04325_00010642><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 이건 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨린다는
　네 사명을 완수할 수 있도록
　네게 주어진 능력인 게 분명해.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10642.zh-Hans:
<voice 04325_00010642><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>一定是为了让你完成

才让你得到这个能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10642.zh-Hant:
<voice 04325_00010642><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>這肯定是為了讓你完成
打倒冥王內爾格爾的使命
才賦予的能力。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10551.ja:
<voice 04395_00010551><center>　聞こえますか？
　エテーネの民　<pc>よ。
10551.zh-Hans:
<voice 04395_00010551><center>你能听到我的声音么，
伊甸之民<pc>。
10551.zh-Hant:
<voice 04395_00010551><center>你能聽到我的聲音嗎？
伊甸子民<pc>。

10552.en:
<voice 04485_00010552><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Perhaps the owner of that voice
brought you here.
The Legendary Pegasus...<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10552.ja:
<voice 04485_00010552><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……この声の主が　あなたを
　ここに　運んでくれたのでしょうね。
　おそらくは　伝説の天馬が……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10552.ko:
<voice 04485_00010552><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……이 목소리의 주인이 당신을
　여기로 데려온 거겠죠.
　아마도 전설의 천마가…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10552.zh-Hans:
<voice 04485_00010552><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……正是这声音的主人
将你带到这里的吧？
它应该就是传说中的天马……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10552.zh-Hant:
<voice 04485_00010552><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……正是這聲音的主人
將你帶到這裡的吧？
應該就是傳說中的天馬……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10582.en:
<voice 04485_00010582><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...I suppose the owner of this voice

The Legendary Pegasus, perhaps...?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10582.ja:
<voice 04485_00010582><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……この声の主が　あなたを

　おそらくは　伝説の天馬かと……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10582.ko:
<voice 04485_00010582><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……이 목소리의 주인이 당신을
　여기로 데려온 거겠죠.
　아마도 전설의 천마가 아닐지…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10582.zh-Hans:
<voice 04485_00010582><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……正是这声音的主人

它应该就是传说中的天马……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10582.zh-Hant:
