10554.en:
<voice 05225_00010554><center>The power of darkness that Nergel
possesses now overwhelms the
light of this world.
10554.ja:
<voice 05225_00010554><center>　冥王ネルゲルの持つ　闇のチカラは　今や
　この世界の光のチカラを　圧倒しています。
10554.ko:
<voice 05225_00010554><center>　명왕 네르겔이 지닌 어둠의 힘은
　이제 이 세상의 빛의 힘을 능가했습니다.
10554.zh-Hans:
<voice 05225_00010554><center>冥王内尔格尔所拥有的暗之力
如今远远强于这个世界的光之力。
10554.zh-Hant:
<voice 05225_00010554><center>冥王內爾格爾所擁有的闇力量
如今遠遠強於這個世界的光力量。

10555.en:
<voice 05265_00010555><center>If this continues, not only Lendersia,
but the entire world will forever
be sealed by darkness.
10555.ja:
<voice 05265_00010555><center>　このままでは　レンダーシアはおろか
　世界のすべてが　いずれ　闇の封印に
　堕とされてしまうことでしょう。
10555.ko:
<voice 05265_00010555><center>　이대로 가다간 렌더시아는 물론이거니와
　이 세상 전체가 어둠의 봉인으로
　뒤덮이고 말 겁니다.
10555.zh-Hans:
<voice 05265_00010555><center>这样下去，
不仅是冷达西亚，
整个世界早晚都会被暗之封印吞没。
10555.zh-Hant:
<voice 05265_00010555><center>這樣下去不僅是冷達西亞，
整個世界早晚都會沒入
闇之封印當中。

10556.en:
<voice 05995_00010556><center>And the only way to prevent that
is with the return of Ethene's people...
<pc>... you are the only one left.
10556.ja:
<voice 05995_00010556><center>　そして　それを防ぐことができるのは
　エテーネの民の姿を　取り戻した
　<pc>……あなただけなのです。
10556.ko:
<voice 05995_00010556><center>　그리고 그걸 막을 수 있는 건
　에테네 주민의 모습을 되찾은
　<pc>…… 당신뿐입니다.
10556.zh-Hans:
<voice 05995_00010556><center>而能阻止这一切的，
只有找回了伊甸之民形态的你。
<pc>……只有你才能做到。
10556.zh-Hant:
<voice 05995_00010556><center>而能阻止這一切的，
只有取回了伊甸子民形態的你<pc>……
就只有你了。

10557.en:
<voice 06045_00010557><center>You are the strongest heir in Ethene's
bloodline. This power can be used to
change the course of history itself.
10557.ja:
<voice 06045_00010557><center>　あなたは　いにしえのエテーネの民の血を
　もっとも強く　受け継ぐ者。
　そのチカラは　歴史の因果すら変えうるのです。
10557.ko:
<voice 06045_00010557><center>　당신은 고대 에테네 주민의 피를
　가장 강하게 물려받은 자.
　그 힘은 역사의 인과마저 바꿀 수 있습니다.
10557.zh-Hans:
<voice 06045_00010557><center>你最浓厚地继承了伊甸之民
上古时代的血统，
你的力量足以颠覆历史。
10557.zh-Hant:
<voice 06045_00010557><center>你繼承了
上古伊甸子民的濃厚血統，
那股力量足以顛覆歷史。

10558.en:
<voice 06085_00010558><center>Nergel most likely knew this, and fearing this
power, destroyed your home and your people.
10558.ja:
<voice 06085_00010558><center>　ネルゲルも　それを恐れるが故に
　エテーネの村と　エテーネの民を
　滅ぼさんとしたのでしょう。
10558.ko:
<voice 06085_00010558><center>　네르겔도 그것이 두려워서
　에테네 마을과 에테네 주민을
　멸망시키려 한 것이겠죠.
10558.zh-Hans:
<voice 06085_00010558><center>内尔格尔可能正是因为畏惧
这一点，才会将伊甸村和
伊甸之民全部抹杀掉的吧。
10558.zh-Hant:
<voice 06085_00010558><center>內爾格爾應該也是害怕這一點，
才會試圖毀滅伊甸村
與伊甸子民吧。

10559.en:
<voice 06125_00010559><center>The last glimmer of hope was
bringing your soul here with the ritual
of revival, hidden from Nergel's sight.
10559.ja:
<voice 06125_00010559><center>　そして　私は　わずかな希望をつなぐべく
　あなたの魂を　生き返しの儀によって　逃がし
　ネルゲルの目から　かくしたのです。
10559.ko:
<voice 06125_00010559><center>　그리고 전 이 실낱같은 희망을 잇고자
　부활의 의식으로 당신의 영혼을 피신시켜
　네르겔의 눈을 피해 숨겼습니다.
10559.zh-Hans:
<voice 06125_00010559><center>而我为了使这微茫的希望开花结果，
通过复活仪式转移了你的灵魂
并避过了内尔格尔的耳目。
10559.zh-Hant:
<voice 06125_00010559><center>而我為了使這渺茫的希望開花結果，
利用復活儀式轉移了你的靈魂，
藉此避開內爾格爾的耳目。

10560.en:
<voice 07060_00010560><center>Now, it is time for the seeds of hope
to sprout.
10560.ja: <voice 07060_00010560><center>　今こそ　希望の芽の息吹くとき。

10561.en:
<voice 07100_00010561><center>The vehicle that you call Ark of the Earth is actually the reincarnated
form of a mysterious entity known as the Starflight Express.
10561.ja:
<voice 07100_00010561><center>　あなた方が　大地の箱舟と呼ぶ　乗り物。
　あれこそは　かつて　天の箱舟と呼ばれた
　神秘なる存在の　生まれ変わりし姿。
10561.ko:
<voice 07100_00010561><center>　당신들이 대지의 방주라 부르는 열차.
　그것이 바로 일찍이 하늘의 방주라 불렸던
　신비한 존재가 환생한 모습입니다.
10561.zh-Hans:
<voice 07100_00010561><center>你们称之为大地方舟的东西，
前身是叫作天之方舟的
神秘交通工具。
10561.zh-Hant:
<voice 07100_00010561><center>你們稱之為大地方舟的東西，
前身是叫做天之方舟的
神祕交通工具。

10562.en:
<voice 07140_00010562><center>The Ark in its current form has
the ability to cross through time to
the era that you must visit.
10562.ja:
<voice 07140_00010562><center>　私に近しい存在である　かの箱舟が
　時渡りのチカラを持つ　あなたを
　あるべき時代へと　導いてくれるでしょう。
10562.ko:
<voice 07140_00010562><center>　나와 가까운 존재인 그 방주가
　시간 건너기 능력을 지닌 당신을
　당신이 가야 할 시대로 이끌어 줄 겁니다.
10562.zh-Hans:
<voice 07140_00010562><center>方舟拥有与我相似的能力，
将会护送拥有渡时之力的你到你应该去的时代。
10562.zh-Hant:
<voice 07140_00010562><center>方舟擁有與我相似的能力，
應該會指引擁有渡時力量的你
去到該去的時代吧。

10563.ja: <voice 07180_00010563><center>　そして　もうひとつ……。

10564.en:
<voice 08087_00010564><center>The magic I have cast upon you will begin to make you
appear no differently to others, regardless if you are
a human or an Elf.
10564.ja:
<voice 08087_00010564><center>　今　かけた魔法によって　あなたは
　人間の姿　エルフの姿　どちらであっても
　他者から　同じに見えるようになりました。
10564.ko:
<voice 08087_00010564><center>　방금 당신에게 마법을 걸었습니다.
　인간의 몸과 엘프의 몸, 둘 중 어느 쪽이든
　다른 이들에게는 같은 모습으로 보일 겁니다.
10564.zh-Hans:
<voice 08087_00010564><center>因为我的魔法，你现在即使在
人类与埃尔夫的形态间任意转换，
别人也看不出区别。
10564.zh-Hant:
<voice 08087_00010564><center>因為我的魔法，你現在即使在
人類與艾爾芙的形態間任意轉換，
別人也看不出區別。

<voice 08337_00010746><center>The magic I have cast upon you will begin to make you
appear no differently to others, regardless if you are
a human or a Weddie.
10746.ja:

　人間の姿　ウェディの姿　どちらであっても
　他者から　同じに見えるようになりました。
10746.ko:

10746.zh-Hant:

10686.zh-Hant:

10625.ja:

10657.en:
<voice 09130_00010657><center>This will ensure that acquaintances who already know
you will not be confused by your change in outward
appearance.
10657.ja:
<voice 09130_00010657><center>　これで　あなたのことを知る人々が
　あなたが　姿を変えることによって
　混乱することは　なくなるでしょう。
10657.ko:
<voice 09130_00010657><center>　이걸로 당신을 아는 이들이
　당신의 외모가 변한다고 해서
　혼란을 겪는 일은 없을 겁니다.
10657.zh-Hans:
<voice 09130_00010657><center>这样一来，认识你的人
就不会因为你的外形发生了改变
而感到混乱了。
10657.zh-Hant:
<voice 09130_00010657><center>這樣一來，認識你的人
就不會因為你的外形發生改變
而感到混亂了。

10566.en:
<voice 09190_00010566><center>You are now ready for your journey
to the past. I shall return you from
whence you came, <pc> of Ethene.
10566.ja:
<voice 09190_00010566><center>　過去への旅の準備は　ととのいました。
　さあ　そろそろ　お戻りなさい。
　エテーネの民　<pc>よ。
10566.ko:
<voice 09190_00010566><center>　이제 과거로 떠날 준비는 끝났습니다.
　자, 이제 돌아가십시오.
　에테네의 주민 {pc}|hpp(이여,여).
10566.zh-Hans:
<voice 09190_00010566><center>返回过去的旅行已经准备好了。
伊甸之民<pc>，
启程回到过去吧。
10566.zh-Hant:
<voice 09190_00010566><center>返回過去的旅行已經準備好了。
伊甸子民<pc>，
啟程回到過去吧。

10567.en:
<voice 09685_00010567><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Seems to me that you have a
pretty good idea of what you need
to do.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10567.ja:
<voice 09685_00010567><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……どうやら　あなたのなすべきことが
　ハッキリしたようですね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10567.ko:
<voice 09685_00010567><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……보아하니 당신이 해야 할 일이
　명확해진 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10567.zh-Hans:
<voice 09685_00010567><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看起来你似乎已经
知道自己该去做什么了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10567.zh-Hant:
<voice 09685_00010567><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看起來你似乎已經
知道自己該去做什麼了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10568.en:
<voice 09715_00010568><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>In any of your future battles, please
consider using your Elf form, too.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10568.ja:
<voice 09715_00010568><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「今後の戦い。できれば　人間の姿だけでなく
　エルフの姿も　使ってやってください。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10568.ko:
<voice 09715_00010568><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 앞으로 펼쳐질 싸움에서
　가능하면 인간의 몸만이 아니라
　엘프의 몸도 사용해 주세요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10568.zh-Hans:
<voice 09715_00010568><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>希望你在今后的战斗中不要只使用人类的形态，
也用用埃尔夫的形态吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10568.zh-Hant:
<voice 09715_00010568><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>希望你在今後的戰鬥中，除了人類的形態外，
也多用用艾爾芙的形態吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10569.en:
<voice 09745_00010569><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Looking at you using my body, I
realized there's a dream I couldn't
fulfill while I was alive...<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10569.ja:
<voice 09745_00010569><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「そして　その姿を使って　
　生前　私が　果たせなかった夢を……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10569.ko:
<voice 09745_00010569><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그리고 그 몸으로
　제가 생전에 이루지 못한 꿈을…….<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10569.zh-Hans:
<voice 09745_00010569><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>然后，用我的形态
去实现我生前未能实现的梦想……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10569.zh-Hant:
<voice 09745_00010569><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>然後，用我的形態
去實現我生前未能實現的夢想……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10570.en:
<voice 10645_00010570><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Never mind, I shouldn't have said
anything. Don't worry about it.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10570.ja:
<voice 10645_00010570><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……いえ。
　今　言うべきことでは　ありませんでしたね。
　どうか　忘れてください。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10570.ko:
<voice 10645_00010570><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아뇨.
　지금 할 말은 아니었네요.
　부디 잊어 주세요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10570.zh-Hans:
<voice 10645_00010570><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……抱歉。
现在不是说这件事的时候，
请你忘记我的话吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10570.zh-Hant:
<voice 10645_00010570><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……抱歉。
現在不是說這件事的時候，
請你忘記我的話吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10571.en:
<voice 10675_00010571><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Take care then. Be sure to defeat
Nergel and release Lendersia from
his clutches.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10571.ja:
<voice 10675_00010571><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それでは　お気をつけて。
　必ず　冥王ネルゲルを倒して
　レンダーシアを　解放してください。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10571.ko:
<voice 10675_00010571><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그럼 조심해서 가세요.
　반드시 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨려
　렌더시아를 해방시켜 주시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10571.zh-Hans:
<voice 10675_00010571><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那么祝你一路顺风。
一定要打败冥王内尔格尔，
将冷达西亚从他的魔掌中解放出来。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10571.zh-Hant:
<voice 10675_00010571><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那麼祝你一路順風。
一定要打敗冥王內爾格爾，
將冷達西亞從他的魔掌中解放出來。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 10645_00010600><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...No, I misspoke.
Now's not the time to be saying this.
Please forget I said anything.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10600.ja:
<voice 10645_00010600><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……いいえ。

10601.en:
<voice 10675_00010601><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Please, take care of yourself.
You have to defeat Nergel and
liberate Lendersia from his clutches.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10601.ja:
<voice 10675_00010601><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それでは　くれぐれも　お気をつけください。
　必ずや　冥王ネルゲルを倒して
　レンダーシアを　解放してくださいまし。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10601.ko:
<voice 10675_00010601><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그럼 모쪼록 조심하시길.
　반드시 명왕 네르겔을 쓰러뜨려
　렌더시아를 해방시켜 주세요.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10601.zh-Hans:
<voice 10675_00010601><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那么祝你一路顺风。
一定要打败冥王内尔格尔，
将冷达西亚从他的魔掌中解放出来。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10601.zh-Hant:
<voice 10675_00010601><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那麼祝你一路順風。
一定要打敗冥王內爾格爾，
將冷達西亞從他的魔掌中解放出來。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10749.en:

what you need to do, huh?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10749.zh-Hans:

10750.en:
<voice 09905_00010750><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you could, I would really
love it if you would use this

<voice 09905_00010750><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 가능하면 내 웨디의 몸도

10750.zh-Hans:
<voice 09905_00010750><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>可能的话，希望你能

10750.zh-Hant:

10751.en:
<voice 09935_00010751><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>And if you use my appearance,

10751.ja:

10751.ko:

10751.zh-Hans:
<voice 09935_00010751><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>然后有朝一日，用我的形态

10751.zh-Hant:
<voice 09935_00010751><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>然後有朝一日，用我的形態

我不该说这些。

10752.zh-Hant:

10753.en:
<voice 10775_00010753><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Well, see ya later! I have no doubt

10753.zh-Hans:

10753.zh-Hant:

10780.en:

10781.zh-Hant:

<voice 10745_00010782><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Nah. It's nothing.

10689.ko:

10689.zh-Hans:

10690.zh-Hant:

10692.ko:

10693.en:

去實現我生前未實現的夢想……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10722.en:
<voice 10855_00010722><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...But now's not the time for it. Before anything else,
defeating Nergel takes priority. Now, back to what I
was saying, before I forget.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10722.ja:
<voice 10855_00010722><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……今は　それどころじゃないか。
　何より　ネルゲルを倒すのが　先決。
　今　言いかけたことは　忘れとくれ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10722.ko:
<voice 10855_00010722><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……지금은 이런 얘길 할 상황이 아닌가.
　무엇보다 네르겔을 쓰러뜨리는 게 급선무니까.
　방금 내가 하려고 한 말은 잊어 줘.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10722.zh-Hans:
<voice 10855_00010722><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……现在还不是说这个的时候，
眼下的头等大事是解决掉内尔格尔。
请忘掉我刚才的话吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10722.zh-Hant:
<voice 10855_00010722><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……現在還不是說這個的時候，
眼下的頭等大事是解決掉內爾格爾。
請忘掉我剛才的話吧。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10723.en:
<voice 10885_00010723><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>See ya and take care. Make sure that you beat that
low-life Nergel and save Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10723.ja:
<voice 10885_00010723><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　元気でな。
　必ず　ネルゲルの野郎を倒して
　レンダーシアを　解放してくれよ！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10723.ko:
<voice 10885_00010723><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 지내.
　네르겔 그 자식을 꼭 해치워서
　렌더시아를 해방시켜 줘!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10723.zh-Hans:
<voice 10885_00010723><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那么祝你一路顺风！
一定要打倒内尔格尔那个可恶的家伙，
将冷达西亚解放出来啊！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10723.zh-Hant:
<voice 10885_00010723><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那就保重了。
一定要打倒內爾格爾那個可惡的傢伙，
解放冷達西亞啊！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10813.ja: <voice 10225_00010813><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「ンゴ～　ンゴゴゴ……。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10813.ko: <voice 10225_00010813><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 크어~ 크어어어~<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10813.zh-Hans: <voice 10225_00010813><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>呼，噜噜噜噜噜……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10813.zh-Hant: <voice 10225_00010813><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>呼～嚕嚕嚕嚕……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10814.en:
<voice 10270_00010814><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>..Ahhh. The story was too long, so
it put me to sleep!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10814.ja:
<voice 10270_00010814><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……ファ～～。
　話が長すぎて　思わず　寝ちゃったよ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10814.ko:
<voice 10270_00010814><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……흐아암~~
　얘기가 너무 길어서 깜빡 졸았어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10814.zh-Hans:
<voice 10270_00010814><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……呼～～
说得太冗长了，我不由得睡着了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10814.zh-Hant:
<voice 10270_00010814><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……呼～～
說得太冗長了，我不由得睡著了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10816.en:
<voice 10360_00010816><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Well, it's good to have a purpose in life.
When I was still alive and kicking,
I had big dreams, too.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10816.ja:
<voice 10360_00010816><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「まあ　目的があるのは　いいことだよ。
　ボクも　生きてたころには
　そりゃあ　ビッグな夢が　あったもんさ。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10816.ko:
<voice 10360_00010816><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 목표가 있는 건 좋은 일이지.
　나도 살아 있었을 때는
　엄청나게 큰 꿈이 있었다고.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10816.zh-Hans:
<voice 10360_00010816><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，目标明确是件好事。
我活着的时候
也有个宏大的梦想呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10816.zh-Hant:
<voice 10360_00010816><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，有目標是件好事。
我活著的時候
也有個宏大的夢想呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10815.en:
<voice 10300_00010815><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...and by looking at your face, it seems
like you got an idea of how to
do things.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10815.ja:
<voice 10300_00010815><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……んで　キミの　そのカオを見るに
　やるべきことが　わかったみたいだね。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10815.ko:
<voice 10300_00010815><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아무튼, 네 얼굴을 보아하니
　이제 뭘 해야 할지 명확해졌나 보군.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10815.zh-Hans:
<voice 10300_00010815><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看你那表情，
似乎已经明确下一步的目标了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10815.zh-Hant:
<voice 10300_00010815><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看你那表情，
似乎已經明白下一步的目標了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10817.en:
<voice 10390_00010817><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...Oh, duh! Since you can change forms
now, why don't I just let you make
my dreams come true for me?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10817.ja:
<voice 10390_00010817><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……おおっ　そーだよ！
　変身できるんだから　ボクの夢は
　キミにかなえてもらえば　いいんじゃ……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10817.ko:
<voice 10390_00010817><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……오, 그렇지!
　이제 변신할 수 있으니까 내 꿈은
　네가 대신 이뤄주면 되는 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10817.zh-Hans:
<voice 10390_00010817><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……哦，对了啊！
你既然能变成我的样子，
替我去实现梦想不就……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10817.zh-Hant:
<voice 10390_00010817><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……喔喔，對了！
你既然能變成我的樣子，
替我去實現夢想不就……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10818.en:
<voice 10955_00010818><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...w-wait. Forget it. No matter how
long you use my form, there's not much
you can actually do about it.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10818.ja:
<voice 10955_00010818><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……あ～　いやいや。
　いくら　ボクの姿に変われるからって
　こればっかりは　どうにもならないや。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10818.ko:
<voice 10955_00010818><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아~ 아니다.
　아무리 내 몸을 쓸 수 있어도
　이거 하나는 어찌 할 방법이 없겠어.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10818.zh-Hans:
<voice 10955_00010818><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……啊，不行不行。
就算你能变身成为我，
也是无济于事的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10818.zh-Hant:
<voice 10955_00010818><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……啊，不行不行。
就算你能變身成為我
也是無濟於事的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10819.en:
<voice 10985_00010819><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>The spirit of comedy lies deep in our
hearts! A true golden spirit that'll throw
it all away just to get a single laugh!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10819.ja:
<voice 10985_00010819><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「お笑いスピリッツとは　心に宿るもの！
　ひとつの笑いを　取るためだけに
　すべてを投げ打つことができる　黄金の精神！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10819.ko:
<voice 10985_00010819><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 자고로 개그 스피릿은 마음에 깃드는 법!
　한 번이라도 더 웃기기 위해
　모든 걸 내던질 수 있는 굳센 정신력!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10819.zh-Hans:
<voice 10985_00010819><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>搞笑精神源自于内心！
那是一种为博人一笑，能够拉得下面子，
将一切置之度外的黄金精神。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10819.zh-Hant:
<voice 10985_00010819><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>搞笑精神源自於內心！
那是一種為博人一笑，能夠拉得下面子，
將一切置之度外的黃金精神！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10820.en:
<voice 11015_00010820><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you had that kind of spirit, I'd ask
no question. You certainly have the
qualities, though...<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10820.ja:
<voice 11015_00010820><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「もし　キミが　その精神の持ち主なら
　迷わず　頼むんだけどな～。
　……確かに　素質はあるみたいだけど。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10820.ko:
<voice 11015_00010820><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 만약 네가 그런 정신력을 갖고 있었다면
　아무 고민 없이 부탁했을 텐데~
　……물론 소질은 있는 것 같지만.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10820.zh-Hans:
<voice 11015_00010820><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>如果你具备那种精神，
我会毫不犹豫地将梦想托付给你。
……虽然你好像确实挺有潜质的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10820.zh-Hant:
<voice 11015_00010820><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>如果你具備那種精神，
我會毫不猶豫地將夢想託付給你～
……雖然你好像確實挺有資質的。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10821.en:
<voice 11070_00010821><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Ah, well... In the meantime, you
follow your own dreams!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10821.ja:
<voice 11070_00010821><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……まあ　いいや。
　とりあえず　キミは　キミの夢を追ってくれよ！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10821.ko:
<voice 11070_00010821><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 됐어.
　넌 네 꿈을 좇도록 해!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10821.zh-Hans:
<voice 11070_00010821><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……不过，算了吧。
你还是先去追求自己的梦想好了！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10821.zh-Hant:
<voice 11070_00010821><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……不過，算了吧。
你還是先去追求自己的夢想好了！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10822.en:
Bye bye, of Ethene Village. I'm really rooting for you to pulverize Nergel and make Lendersia a happy
place again!
10822.ja:

　解放してくれること　そこそこ期待してるよ！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10822.ko:
<voice 11100_00010822><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 가라, 에테네 마을의 <pc>. 
　네가 네르겔을 쓰러뜨리고 렌더시아를
　해방시켜 주길 나도 쪼~금은 기대할게!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10822.zh-Hans:
<voice 11100_00010822><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>那么拜拜了，伊甸村的<pc>。
我就稍微地期待一下你打倒内尔格尔，
解放冷达西亚的好消息吧！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10822.zh-Hant:

我就小小地期待一下你打倒內爾格爾，
解放冷達西亞的好消息吧！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10853.en:
<voice 10270_00010853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>..Ahhh. The story was too long, so

10853.zh-Hans:
<voice 10270_00010853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……呼～～

10853.zh-Hant:
<voice 10270_00010853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……呼～～
說得太冗長了，我不由得睡著了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10854.en:
<voice 10300_00010854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...and by the look on your face, you

10854.ja:
<voice 10300_00010854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……んで　そのカオからすると　キミ

10854.ko:
<voice 10300_00010854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아무튼, 그 얼굴을 보아하니

10854.zh-Hans:
<voice 10300_00010854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看你那表情，
似乎已经明确下一步的目标了。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10854.zh-Hant:
<voice 10300_00010854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……看你那表情，

10855.en:
<voice 10360_00010855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Yeah. It's good to have a purpose in
life, isn't it? When I was still
around, I had big dreams, too.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10855.ja:
<voice 10360_00010855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「うん。目的があるのは　いいことよね。
　アタシも　生きてたころには
　そりゃあ　ビッグな夢が　あったもの。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10855.ko:
<voice 10360_00010855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 응, 목표가 있는 건 좋은 일이지.
　나도 살아 있었을 때는
　엄청나게 큰 꿈이 있었다고.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10855.zh-Hans:
<voice 10360_00010855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，目标明确是件好事。
我活着的时候
也有个宏大的梦想呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10855.zh-Hant:
<voice 10360_00010855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>嗯，有目標是件好事。
我活著的時候
也有個宏大的夢想呢。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10856.en:
<voice 10390_00010856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Oh, yeah! Since you can change

10856.ja:
<voice 10390_00010856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「……ああっ　そーよ！
　変身できるんだから　アタシの夢は

10856.ko:
<voice 10390_00010856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: ……아, 그래!
　이제 변신할 수 있으니까 내 꿈은
　네가 대신 이뤄주면 되는 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10856.zh-Hans:
<voice 10390_00010856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……啊，对了啊！
你既然能变成我的样子，
替我去实现梦想不就……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10856.zh-Hant:
<voice 10390_00010856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>……啊，對了！
你既然能變成我的樣子，
替我去實現夢想不就……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10628.en:
<voice 10520_00010628><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>...I think I don't have to tell ya

10628.zh-Hans:

10629.en:
<voice 10550_00010629><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>If you can, use my body whenever

<pc> suddenly thought of a dear old
gesture...

<pc>の頭に　突然
なつかしい　しぐさが

令人怀念的动作……

<pc>は

想起了
动作“伊甸式打招呼”。

10862.en:

19001152.en: <voice 00812_19001152><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Same old Junkie #2, ain't it!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001152.ja: <voice 00812_19001152><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「いつも通りの　元ポツコン２号ですねッ！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001152.ko: <voice 00812_19001152><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 평소와 똑같은 전임 터리엉 2호인데요!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001152.zh-Hans: <voice 00812_19001152><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>就是平常的原波茨康２号！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001152.zh-Hant: <voice 00812_19001152><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>就是平常的前波茨康２號！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001153.en:
<voice 00813_19001153><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Hohoho... Seems Ethene's guardian diety's power is
effecting you all, isn't it...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001153.ja:
<voice 00813_19001153><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ホッホッホッ……
　どうやら　エテーネの守り神のチカラが
　おぬしらに　働いているようじゃのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001153.ko:
<voice 00813_19001153><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 홋홋홋……
　아무래도 에테네 수호신의 힘이
　자네들에게 작용하는 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001153.zh-Hans:
<voice 00813_19001153><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
看来伊甸守护神的力量
在你们身上发挥了作用。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001153.zh-Hant:
<voice 00813_19001153><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
看來伊甸守護神的力量
有在你們身上發揮作用。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001154.en:
<voice 00814_19001154><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>To save ya all the confusion o' a form ya're not used
ta; a convenient and stylish arrangement, I'd say...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001154.ja:
<voice 00814_19001154><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしらが　慣れぬ姿に　惑わぬようにと
　コンビニエンスかつ　スタイリッシュな
　はからいじゃろうて。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001154.ko:
<voice 00814_19001154><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네들더러 낯선 모습에 당황하지 말라는
　컨비니언스하고 스타일리시한
　조치인 게지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001154.zh-Hans:
<voice 00814_19001154><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>为了避免你们看到陌生的形态感到混乱，
因此才会有这番
方便又有型的安排。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001154.zh-Hant:
<voice 00814_19001154><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>為了避免你們看到陌生的形態會感到混亂，
因此才會有這番
方便又有型的安排。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001155.en:
<voice 00815_19001155><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc> has, no mistakin' it, regained
their human form. That being this one...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001155.ja:
<voice 00815_19001155><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「<pc>は　まちがいなく
　人間の姿を　取り戻しておるよ。
　これならば……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001155.ko:
<voice 00815_19001155><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(은,는) 틀림없이
　인간의 모습을 되찾았다네.
　이제 됐군…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001155.zh-Hans:
<voice 00815_19001155><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>确实已经取回
人类的形态了。
这么一来……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001155.zh-Hant:
<voice 00815_19001155><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>確實已經取回
人類的形態了。
這麼一來……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001156.ja:
<pc>は
仲間たちと　再会した！

10865.en:
<voice 00840_00010865><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Alright. Now, will ya tell us what happened over there
in detail?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10865.ja:
<voice 00840_00010865><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よし。それでは　むこうで　何があったか
　くわしく　話してくれるかな？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10865.ko:
<voice 00840_00010865><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 그럼 그곳에서 무슨 일이 있었는지
　자세히 얘기해 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10865.zh-Hans:
<voice 00840_00010865><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好了，现在赶快告诉我
到底发生了什么事？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10865.zh-Hant:
<voice 00840_00010865><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>好，那能把你在那邊經歷的事
仔細告訴我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10866.en:
<voice 00985_00010866><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...I see. Ya met Abba, didja. Even in death, she
still watches over ya... What a woman ta look up ta,
dontcha agree.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10866.ja:
<voice 00985_00010866><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……そうか。アバのやつに会ってきたか。
　死してなお　おぬしを見守っておるとは……。
　まったく　見上げた女じゃのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10866.ko:
<voice 00985_00010866><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 아바를 만나고 왔단 말이지.
　죽은 후에도 자네를 지키고 있었다니…….
　참으로 대단한 여자야.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10866.zh-Hans:
<voice 00985_00010866><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……是么，你见到阿巴老婆子了。
没想到她死后依旧守在你的身边……
真是个令人肃然起敬的老太婆啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10866.zh-Hant:
<voice 00985_00010866><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……原來如此，你見到阿巴老婆子了。
沒想到她死後依舊守在你的身邊……
真是個令人肅然起敬的老太婆啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10867.en:
<voice 01015_00010867><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>And after regaining yer true form at the Temple of
Light, that ya received advice from a mysterious
voice...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10867.ja:
<voice 01015_00010867><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「そして　自分の真の姿を取り戻したのち
　光の神殿で　不思議な声から
　助言をもらったというのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10867.ko:
<voice 01015_00010867><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그리고 자네의 진짜 모습을 되찾은 후
　빛의 신전에서 신비한 목소리로부터
　조언을 받았단 말이지…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10867.zh-Hans:
<voice 01015_00010867><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>而且在取回自己真正的身体后，
你还在光之神殿
接受了神秘声音的启示啊……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10867.zh-Hant:
<voice 01015_00010867><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>而且在取回自己真正的形態後，
你還在光之神殿
接受了神祕聲音的啟示啊……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10868.en:
<voice 01055_00010868><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That settles it. If ya follow the voice's guidance
and, as a human, take the Ark of the Earth... Ya should
be able ta travel to when the Sacred Ship was lost.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10868.ja:
<voice 01055_00010868><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ならば　まちがいない。その声の導きどおり
　人間の姿で　大地の箱舟……列車に乗れば
　破邪舟が失われた時代に　行けるはずじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10868.ko:
<voice 01055_00010868><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 틀림없겠군. 그 목소리의 인도대로
　인간 모습으로 대지의 방주, 즉 열차에 타면
　파사주가 소실된 시대로 갈 수 있을 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10868.zh-Hans:
<voice 01055_00010868><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那么，只要遵循那声音的指引，
以人类的形态乘坐大地方舟……也就是列车，
就应该能回到破邪舟失传的时代。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10868.zh-Hant:
<voice 01055_00010868><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那麼，只要遵循那聲音的指引，
以人類的形態乘坐大地方舟……也就是列車，
應該就能回到破邪舟失傳的時代。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10869.en:
<voice 01085_00010869><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I have ta tell ya that after I sentcha to Ethene Village,
I also read the books in this house ta find out more
about the Sacred Ship.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10869.ja:
<voice 01085_00010869><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「じつはな　おぬしをエテーネの村に送ったあと
　わしも　この家にある書物を読み
　破邪舟について　調べてみたんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10869.ko:
<voice 01085_00010869><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 실은 자네를 에테네 마을로 보낸 후에
　나도 이 집에 있는 책을 읽으며
　파사주에 대해 조사해 보았네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10869.zh-Hans:
<voice 01085_00010869><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>其实送你回伊甸村后，
我就在这房子里阅读书卷，
查阅了许多关于破邪舟的资料。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10869.zh-Hant:
<voice 01085_00010869><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>其實送你回伊甸村後，
我就在這房子裡閱讀書卷，
查閱了許多關於破邪舟的資料。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10870.en:
<voice 01285_00010870><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Can't say I'm surprised at Fluka fer leavin' such an
important item in the dust without readin' it.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10870.ja:
<voice 01285_00010870><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「こんな大事なモノを　読まずに
　ほこりを　かぶらせておくとは
　フルッカには　あきれて　ものも言えんわい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10870.ko:
<voice 01285_00010870><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이런 중요한 책을 읽지도 않고
　먼지만 쌓이도록 팽개쳐 두다니
　프룻카의 게으름에는 기가 찰 지경이야.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10870.zh-Hans:
<voice 01285_00010870><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>这么重要的书都不读，
放在那里让它积灰尘。
菲尔迦这懒鬼真让我无语。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10870.zh-Hant:
<voice 01285_00010870><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>這麼重要的書都不讀，
放在那裡讓它長灰塵。
菲爾迦這懶鬼真讓我無語。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10871.en:
<voice 01355_00010871><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>This book contains the history of Glen. The description
of the ship's been missin' for about 500 years now.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10871.ja:
<voice 01355_00010871><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「この書には　グレンの歴史が書かれていてな。
　破邪舟という記述が　消えたのは
　今から　５００年くらい前からなんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10871.ko:
<voice 01355_00010871><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이 책에는 그렌의 역사가 적혀 있는데
　파사주에 관한 기록이 사라진 건
　지금으로부터 500년 전일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10871.zh-Hans:
<voice 01355_00010871><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>这本书上记载了古莲的历史。
其中破邪舟的相关记载
在大约５００年前就中断了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10871.zh-Hant:
<voice 01355_00010871><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>這本書上記載了古蓮的歷史。
其中破邪舟的相關記載
在大約500年前就中斷了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10872.en: <voice 01385_00010872><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Let me tell ya. The one I'm interested in is this page.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10872.ja: <voice 01385_00010872><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「でな。気になるのは　このページじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10872.ko: <voice 01385_00010872><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 가장 의심스러운 건 바로 이 페이지일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10872.zh-Hans: <voice 01385_00010872><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不过我注意到了这一页。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10872.zh-Hant: <voice 01385_00010872><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>不過我注意到了這一頁。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10873.en:
<voice 01435_00010873><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>It was wrote during the exact same time as when an
unprecedented catastrophe occurred.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10873.ja:
<voice 01435_00010873><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「ちょうど　それと同じ時代
　空前の大災害があったと　記されておる。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10873.ko:
<voice 01435_00010873><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 마침 그 시기에 유례없는 대재앙이
　일어났다고 기록되어 있더군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10873.zh-Hans:
<voice 01435_00010873><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>这一页上面记载着，
恰巧在同一时代发生了空前的灾难。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10873.zh-Hant:
<voice 01435_00010873><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>這一頁上面記載著，
恰巧在同一時代發生了空前的大災害。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10874.en:
<voice 01465_00010874><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Those that lived during the great catastrophe did so by
somehow joining forces, it seems; however, fer some
reason the Sacred Ship just disappeared.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10874.ja:
<voice 01465_00010874><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「大災害は　その時代に生きる者が
　チカラをあわせ　なんとかしたようじゃが
　破邪舟は　なぜか　姿を消してしまったんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10874.ko:
<voice 01465_00010874><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 대재앙은 그 시대의 사람들이 힘을 합쳐
　잘 이겨낸 듯하네만 어째서인지
　그때부터 파사주에 관한 언급이 사라졌어.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10874.zh-Hans:
<voice 01465_00010874><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>大难当头，那个时代的人们
团结起来想尽一切对策幸存了下来，
但破邪舟却不知为什么从此消失了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10874.zh-Hant:
<voice 01465_00010874><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那個時代的人們團結起來，
想盡一切對策渡過了大災害，
但破邪舟卻不知為什麼從此消失了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10875.en:
<voice 01575_00010875><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Is yer task clear? What ya must do is find out why
the technique of the Sacred Ship was lost and make
sure it's handed down to the present day.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10875.ja:
<voice 01575_00010875><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「よいか？　おぬしのなすべきことは
　破邪舟の術が　途絶えた原因をつきとめ
　現代にまで　継承させることじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10875.ko:
<voice 01575_00010875><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 알았나? 자네가 할 일은
　파사주의 술법의 맥이 끊긴 원인을 알아내
　현대까지 이어지도록 만드는 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10875.zh-Hans:
<voice 01575_00010875><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>现在你明白了吧？
你的使命就是找到破邪舟之术失传的原因，
改变历史，让它流传至今。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10875.zh-Hant:
<voice 01575_00010875><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>現在你明白了吧？
你的使命就是找到破邪舟之術失傳的原因，
改變歷史，讓它流傳至今。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10876.en:
<voice 01605_00010876><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>A journey to the unknown past... It may be a long
road ahead, but never forget yer mission.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10876.ja:
<voice 01605_00010876><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「未知なる　過去への旅……。
　長い道のりになるかもしれんが
　自分の使命を　決して忘れるでないぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10876.ko:
<voice 01605_00010876><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 미지의 과거로 떠나는 여행…….
　아마도 긴 여행이 되겠지만
　절대 자네의 사명을 잊어버려서는 안 되네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10876.zh-Hans:
<voice 01605_00010876><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>通往未知过去的旅程……
虽然任重道远，
但是你绝不要忘记自己的使命。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10876.zh-Hant:
<voice 01605_00010876><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>通往未知過去的旅程……
雖然任重道遠，
但是你絕不要忘記自己的使命。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

10877.en:
<voice 01655_00010877><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>In order to reach Hades' Heart, we have no choice but
ta use the Sacred Ship. I'm countin' on ya,
<pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10877.ja:
<voice 01655_00010877><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「冥王の心臓に　たどりつくためには
　破邪舟のチカラを　借りるほかないのじゃ。
　頼んだぞ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10877.ko:

10878.en:
<voice 00090_00010878><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Oh yeah? What's the matter, <pc>?
Have ya forgotten what yer supposed to do?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10878.ja:
<voice 00090_00010878><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おや？　どうした　<pc>。

　忘れてしまったのか？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10878.ko:
<voice 00090_00010878><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 응? 무슨 일인가, <pc>?

10878.zh-Hant:

10879.en:
<voice 00120_00010879><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>What ya must do is go to the past and find out why the
technique of the Sacred Ship was lost and make sure
it's handed down to the present day.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10879.ja:
<voice 00120_00010879><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしのなすべきことは　過去へ行き

　現代にまで継承させることじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10879.ko:
<voice 00120_00010879><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네가 할 일은 과거로 가

　현대까지 이어지도록 만드는 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
10879.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00010879><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你的使命就是回到过去，

10879.zh-Hant:

改變歷史，讓它流傳至今。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00160_00010880><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>As a human, take the Ark of the Earth... Ya should be
